1050101.name: Scarlet Skandha Slash
1050101.simpleDesc:
Swings the katana continuously to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Trace is granted when the final strike of the attack results in a hit.

1050201.name: Scarlet: Tassel White
1050201.simpleDesc:
Launches three strikes at the target, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1050202.name: Scarlet: Cloud Water
1050202.simpleDesc:
Launches a cross light blade attack in the shape of a cross at the target, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1050221.name: Scarlet: Ashen Star
1050221.simpleDesc:
Sends a cross light blade flying towards the locked-on target, dealing Physical DMG. Enemies hit are afflicted with Armor Break.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Trace is granted when the first strike of the attack results in a hit; hits with the cross light blade granting another Trace.

1050203.name: Scarlet: Scattered Flowers
1050203.simpleDesc: Launches an Iaido move and unleashes a blade array at the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Traces can be expended following skill cast to launch the next move of Scarlet: Scattered Flowers, dealing Physical DMG and increasing the ATK range of the blade array.

1050209.name: Scarlet: Thousand Peck
1050209.simpleDesc:
Dashes in the direction of the locked-on target and slashes away, dealing Physical DMG. Skill cast triggers Zero Time.

When the Mod or a Teammate crits with a skill or Ultimate Skill cast, Ultimate Skill charge is granted.

1050305.name: Scarlet: Hazy Shadow
1050305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and grants Ultimate Skill charge.

1071101.name: Eastwind Slash
1071101.simpleDesc:
Mengzhang masters five sword moves following keen study of the stars. Deals Wind DMG. When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>, every strike of a normal attack grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Mark.

Passive:
When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>, Thunder DMG increases based on the amount of boosted Wind DMG. When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>, Wind DMG increases based on the amount of boosted Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gants Divine Grace when a hit is landed when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material> with a normal attack.

1071201.name: Aero Ascent
1071201.simpleDesc:
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: Unleashes Aero Ascent, then quickly retreats, dealing Wind DMG. When Aero Ascent is in CD, it is replaced by Aero Dash.
Aero Dash: Dashes at an extreme speed at the enemy, dealing Wind DMG. Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Marks when a hit is landed, and summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> to attack the locked-on enemy based on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107103)>Nay</material> Marks expended.
When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>: this skill is replaced by Aero Break. When Mod switches to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: this skill is replaced by Aero Ascent.
Aero Break: Expends Divine Grace to deal Thunder DMG. This skill may be used alternately during the casting of Stillness in Motion: Thunder or Eternal Prosperity: Thunder. Doing so will change the attack mode and the following DMG of these two skills with more powerful moves. When used alternately with another skill, the remaining CD of Aero Break, Stillness in Motion: Thunder, and Eternal Prosperity: Thunder shortens, and the next use of the skill comes with a new attack mode and will not trigger CD nor interrupt the combo of normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>, every hit landed on the enemy grants Divine Grace.

1071202.name: Stillness in Motion
1071202.simpleDesc:
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: This skill is replaced by Stillness in Motion: Wind. Skill cast blocks incoming DMG and summons some <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> that attack the locked-on enemy. When this skill is in CD, every hit landed with a normal attack summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> of varying numbers which attack the locked-on enemy.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Sword</material>: Deals Wind DMG and increases Mod's Wind DMG.
When in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>: This skill is replaced by Stillness in Motion: Thunder. Expends Divine Grace to deal DMG over two strikes. Depending on when Aero Break is cast alternately with this skill, two follow-on sword moves occur, and each dealing different damage.
Move 1: Casting Aero Break directly;
Move 2: Casting Aero Break before the second strike.

1071203.name: Eternal Prosperity

1071209.name: Dragon's Lunar Mansions
1071209.simpleDesc:
Use this to harness the power of the wind and thunder, dealing Thunder DMG. Depending on Mod's stance at the time of casting, increases their Wind or Thunder DMG.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge whenever Mod or a teammate casts their Ultimate Skill or switches to another stance.

1071305.name: Aero Dodge
1071305.simpleDesc:
Dodge effect in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107101)>Still stance</material>: triggers some <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107104)>Jade Swords</material> that attack the locked-on enemy.
Dodge effect in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107102)>Move stance</material>: the next casting of Stillness in Motion: Thunder or Eternal Prosperity: Thunder grants Unyielding and DMG blocking effects.

1052101.name: Storm Blitz
1052101.simpleDesc:
Fires two volleys using the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG. Then, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105202)>Storm Mode</material> to bombard enemies in the front, dealing Physical DMG. When the buff from Total Firepower is active, the last strike of the normal attack also summons a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105202)>Storm Mode</material> that rolls forward and launches three cannon shots, dealing Physical DMG.

Passive:
Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> when Energy is expended or when the third strike of the normal attack concludes. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> is full, hold down the Normal Attack button to unleash Hissing in Rage.
Hissing in Rage: Maxes out the Rage Serpent's firing rate for a firepower deluge, dealing Physical DMG. No <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> will be granted during this effect.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Restores Energy at intervals. Also gains Energy whenever a normal attack or Hissing in Rage hits.

1052201.name: Total Firepower
1052201.simpleDesc:
Fires three consecutive cannon shots at the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG. Increases the Base DMG of all team members' Skill 1 and gains Energy upon each cannon shot hit. Cannon shots not fired by the end of the skill cast will reduce the remaining CD of the skill. When Energy is full, the skill is replaced with Firepower Assist.
Firepower Assist: Expends Energy and calls in ranged bombardment to enemies in the front, dealing Physical DMG. When Hissing in Rage is active with Energy at max, Firepower Assist will be cast automatically and the required Energy will be expended automatically, too.

1052202.name: Quick Response
1052202.simpleDesc:
Bombards the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG and inflicting Stun on all enemies within range. Upon landing a hit, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105203)>Rafale Mode</material> to conduct an area bombardment, dealing Physical DMG. Reduces the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> cost after this skill is cast.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD and increases the skill's Energy cost.

1052221.name: Quick Response
1052221.simpleDesc:
Bombards the enemy with the Rage Serpent, dealing Physical DMG and inflicting Stun on all enemies within range. Upon landing a hit, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105205)>Whirlwind Mode</material> to bombard the enemies within range. When there are teammates on the field, reduces the enemy's certain type of RES based on said teammates' DMG type and DMG amount.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD and increases the skill's Energy cost.

1052203.name: Surround & Eliminate
1052203.simpleDesc:
Throws an implosion grenade that deals Physical DMG and pulls in the enemy for a short time. Then, call in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105204)>Bourasque Mode</material> to conduct an area bombardment, dealing more Physical DMG. Skill cast also increases the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> gain rate.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD and increases the skill's Energy cost.

1052231.name: Surround & Eliminate
1052231.simpleDesc:
Throws an implosion grenade that deals Physical DMG and pulls in enemies for a short time. Then, calls in a drone in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105206)>Hurricane Mode</material> to drop traps with Slow debuff in the target area, with each trap dealing Physical DMG continuously, and sending the enemies hit into Sluggish state.
When the Mod or a teammate lands a hit with this drone, reduces the skill's CD and increases the skill's Energy cost.

1052209.name: War of the Gods: End
1052209.simpleDesc:
Calls in several drones in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105207)>Torrent Mode</material> to bombard the target area, dealing Physical DMG and also inflicting Armor Break on enemies hit.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate successfully expends Energy.

1052305.name: Emergency Protection
1052305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Reduces DMG taken by the Mod depending on the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105201)>Firepower</material> point owned.

1066101.name: BunBun Iron Fist
1066101.simpleDesc:
Summons BunBun Iron Fist to attack the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage: </color>Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1066201.name: Divination
1066201.simpleDesc:
Draws one Tarot Card to gain a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106601)>Divination effect</material>. When the card drawn is different from the previous one, the effect is increased.
<color=#ad25b5>Death</color>: Increases ATK.
<color=#d7ac00>The Chariot</color>: Grants Rage periodically.
<color=#5cb82b>The Lovers</color>: Restores HP periodically.

1066202.name: BunBun Cannon
1066202.simpleDesc: Fires BunBun-2 at enemies in front, dealing Physical DMG. Continues to ricochet after hitting an enemy, dealing Physical DMG.

1066203.name: BunBun Gunner
1066203.simpleDesc: Leaps into the air to attack enemies in a circular area in front, dealing Physical DMG.

1066231.name: BunBun Strike
1066231.simpleDesc: Summons BunBun-3 to attack the nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG. The BunBun-3 also exerts a drag effect on surrounding enemies during attacks.

1066209.name: Deus ex Machina
1066209.simpleDesc:
Summons BunBun-3 to attack the nearby enemies, dealing Physical DMG. Resets the CD of Skill 3, and shortens the remaining CD of other allied Mods' Skill 3.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge whenever the Mod or a Teammate uses an Ultimate Skill.

1045101.name: Corroding Rend
1045101.simpleDesc:
Initiate a 4-hit ground combo, dealing Fire DMG. Continuing with a fifth Normal Attack launches Alisa into the air. While airborne, Alisa gains Unyielding and can perform the fifth and sixth Normal Attacks, both dealing Fire DMG. If the fifth strike is a hit, the Divine Grace charge speed increases.
In Gun Mode, attacks deal Fire DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> In Slash Mode, Normal Attacks grant Divine Grace on hit.

1045201.name: Death Strike
1045201.simpleDesc:
While on the ground: Alisa deals Fire DMG. If followed by a Normal Attack, the combo continues from the fourth strike.
While airborne: Alisa deals Fire DMG. If Alisa hits with increased Divine Grace charge speed from Normal Attacks, the charge speed increases further and the next strike continues from the sixth Normal Attack.
Eruption: Alisa consumes Divine Grace to fire bullets and deal Fire DMG.

1045202.name: Body Devouring Rage
1045202.simpleDesc:
When on the ground, God Arc switches to Predator Form, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points.
When airborne, full Divine Grace is required to activate; consuming all Divine Grace, God Arc switches to Predator Form, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points.
While dodging on the move, it can be chained; God Arc switches to Predator Form, dealing Fire DMG and gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points based on impact distance.
Each time <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> is full, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104602)>"Liberation Stage"</material> increases; ATK is boosted based on your current <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104602)>"Liberation Stage"</material> level.

When God Arc in Predator Form hits special enemies, different bullets are acquired; upon entering "Gun Mode", this skill is replaced with "Wasteland Bullet", dealing different DMG:
Ogretail: deals Physical DMG;
Kongou: deals Wind DMG;
Father Di Ausu: deals Thunder DMG.

1045203.name: Star Pulse
1045203.simpleDesc:
Grounded startup move "Zero Stance" interrupts ground-based Normal Attack, Skills, and Dodge actions, and does not break the first three links of a Normal Attack combo.
 "Zero Stance" provides defense; upon successfully blocking an attack, gain Liberation Index points and grant invincibility.
 For a brief period after casting "Zero Stance", "Fatal Onslaught" is replaced by "IE Blade Cannon Explosion", and "Self-Consuming Fury" is replaced by "IE Purgatory Flames"; "Zero Stance" can chain into casting "IE Blade Cannon Explosion", and "Zero Stance" and "IE Blade Cannon Explosion" can chain into casting "IE Purgatory Flames".
 "IE Blade Cannon Explosion": Deals fire DMG, with increased skill DMG during casting.
 "IE Purgatory Flames": Consumes all Divine Grace, deals fire DMG, and grants the "God Arc Controlled" state upon casting; this skill consumes Divine Grace and boosts critical DMG, with additional critical DMG increase determined by the level of the "Liberation Stage".
 "God Arc Controlled": Based on the "Liberation Stage" at acquisition, if the "Liberation Stage" is not Lv.3, periodically gain Liberation Index points; if the "Liberation Stage" is Lv.3, periodically consume Liberation Index points; the state ends when the "Liberation Stage" is increased or decreased.

1045209.name: Godslayer: Massacre
1045209.simpleDesc:
Deals Fire DMG; Increases own Fire DMG when cast; if in "Gun Mode", exit "Gun Mode".

When self or a teammate triggers Zero Time and obtains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material>, gains Ultimate Skill charge.

1045305.name: Nimble Stance
1045305.simpleDesc:
While in "Slash Mode", if not performing a movement dodge, you block incoming attacks. Successful blocks grant you <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points and invincibility.
While in "Slash Mode", when long-pressing a movement dodge, you enter "Gun Mode": you gain a stagger effect, Normal Attack changes its attack mode, "Death Strike" is replaced by "Burst Eruption", and "Star Pulse" is replaced by "Slash Mode". You can exit "Gun Mode" using the replacement skill.
Movement dodges in "Slash Mode" and dodges in "Gun Mode" allow you to evade enemy attacks, with Extremity Dodge triggering the Dodge effect.
Dodge effect: Zero Time.

1046101.name: Swift Harvest
1046101.simpleDesc:
Deals Ice DMG.
After dealing Crit a certain number of times, gain <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104603)>"Blood Point"</material> Mark.
While on the ground, holding the Normal Attack will consume <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104603)>"Blood Point"</material> Mark to unleash the enhanced Normal Attack "Blood Rage Devour".
"Blood Rage Devour": Continuously deals DMG to yourself and enemies, inflicting Ice DMG. After each hit, the DMG dealt to yourself increases, and the DMG to enemies rises. The final hit will trigger an explosive attack, dealing Ice DMG and increasing the DMG based on the current lost HP. Upon hitting, it restores HP; this attack will not interrupt the combo of Normal Attacks.

In "Gun Mode", deals Ice DMG.

In the air, deals Ice DMG, then automatically transitions to the falling attack "Blood's Swift Strike".

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in "Gun Mode", landing a Normal Attack on the ground will grant Divine Grace.

1046201.name: Bloody Blitz
1046201.simpleDesc:
When on the ground, deals Ice DMG. Leaps into the air when attacking and automatically follows up the attack with a falling attack, dealing Ice DMG. Gains Unyielding when in the air. When in the air, the skill can be launched early and will be instantly followed up with a falling attack.
Spinning Throw: Expends Divine Grace, dealing Ice DMG.

1046202.name: Blood Awakening
1046202.simpleDesc:
When entering the field, if the Crit Rate increases to a certain value, the Crit Rate will decrease. Based on the decrease in Crit Rate, the acquisition rate of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> increases.
Consume all Divine Grace to enter a storage state. Based on the consumed Divine Grace, gain <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points; reaching the storage time limit will trigger a predatory attack. During storage, clicking again will immediately perform a predatory attack, dealing Ice DMG. Depending on the storage time, additional <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points will be gained upon hit; during casting, gain a stiffening effect, reducing DMG taken.
Each time <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> is full, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104602)>"Liberation Stage"</material> increases; based on the level of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104602)>"Liberation Stage"</material>, the Crit Rate increases.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104602)>"Liberation Stage"</material> are full, performing a Normal Attack in "Gun Mode" will enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104604)>"Liberation State"</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104604)>"Liberation State"</material>: Upon entering, consume <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> to deal Ice DMG, then intermittently consume <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points, increasing effects based on the level of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104602)>"Liberation Stage"</material>.

When the God Arc's predatory form hits special enemies, different bullets will be obtained; when entering "Gun Mode," this skill will be replaced by "Aragami Bullet," dealing different DMG:
Ogretail: Deals Physical DMG;
Vajra: Deals Wind DMG;
Father Dios: Deals Thunder DMG.

While in the air, consume <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104603)>"Blood Points"</material> mark to deal Ice DMG.

1046203.name: Blood Bullet
1046203.simpleDesc:
While on the ground, enter "Gun Mode," gain a stagger effect, Normal Attack changes attack mode, "Bloody Blitz" is replaced by "Spinning Throw," "Blood Awakening" is replaced by "Aragami Bullet," "Blood Bullet" is replaced by "Transformation," and you can exit "Gun Mode" through this replacement skill.

While in the air, deal Ice DMG; when cast, reset the remaining CD of "Bloody Blitz."

1046209.name: Godslayer: Bloody Dance
1046209.simpleDesc:
Deals Ice DMG; Increases own Ice DMG when cast; Exit "Gun Mode" if in "Gun Mode".

 Gain Ultimate Skill charge when self or ally triggers Zero Time.

1046305.name: Dexterous Stance
1046305.simpleDesc:
When not moving to dodge, defense is performed, and upon successfully blocking an attack, you gain <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104601)>"Liberation Index"</material> points.
Dodge effect: Zero Time.

1048101.name: Quick Shot
1048101.simpleDesc:
Fires a series of shots at the locked-on target, dealing Light DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains Energy periodically.

1048201.name: Precision Bombing
1048201.simpleDesc: Shoots a laserbeam at the target, dealing Light DMG and inflicting Shackle to enemies hit.

1048211.name: Repeat Bombardment
1048211.simpleDesc: Launches multiple rounds of bombardment at the enemies in front, dealing Light DMG. Inflicts Shackle on enemies hit. Bombarding the same target multiple times in a row during a single bombardment reduces the DMG dealt on subsequent hits.

1048202.name: Guided Strike
1048202.simpleDesc: Summons airstrikes to bomb the target area, dealing Light DMG.

1048203.name: Pulsation
1048203.simpleDesc: Unleashes a continuous Pulsation attack, with each strike dealing Light DMG.

1048209.name: Missile Burst
1048209.simpleDesc:
Launches several missiles at enemies in the target area, dealing Light DMG. Restores Energy to the team upon each missile hit.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy is inflicted with Shackle.

1048305.name: Amber Time
1048305.simpleDesc: Dodge Effect: Inflicts the attacker with Shackle.

1148101.name: Block Shot
1148101.simpleDesc: Fires continuously at the enemies nearby, dealing Physical DMG.

1148201.name: Grenade
1148201.simpleDesc:
Throws a Grenade that explodes a few seconds later, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants Traces with each skill hit.

1148202.name: Chained Crosshair
1148202.simpleDesc:
Locks the enemy automatically and fires, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1148203.name: Sniper Mode
1148203.simpleDesc:
Zenkibo's weapon changes into a sniper rifle, and Sniper Mode is turned on. Using a Dodge immediately ends the mode and send it into CD.
Sniper Mode: Mod cannot move or use other skills. Tap on the Skill to aim at the target, dealing Physical DMG.

1148209.name: Piercing Snipe
1148209.simpleDesc:
Changes weapon into a sniper rifle and fires a shot that penetrates enemies in front in a straight line, dealing Physical DMG. Grants Trace to the Mod and the Teammates if the skill lands.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or the Teammates trigger Zero Time.

1039101.name: Dew Missile
1039101.simpleDesc:
Summons dew drops that attack enemies in front, dealing Water DMG.

Passive:
When Divine Grace is at max, casting the skill does not trigger CD and will expend all Divine Grace.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack lands.

1039201.name: Grace of the Sea
1039201.simpleDesc: Restores the HP of all Teammates within a certain range.

1039211.name: Blue Whalesong
1039211.simpleDesc: Restores the HP of all Teammates within a certain range. The healed units also obtain combat resources more quickly, plus a certain amount of the corresponding Combat Resources.

1039202.name: Starry Drizzle
1039202.simpleDesc: Increases the additional ATK of the team.

1039203.name: Torrential Surge
1039203.simpleDesc: Summons a surging wave that slowly advances to the front, dealing Water DMG.

1039209.name: Tide Song
1039209.simpleDesc:
Increases the Max HP of all members in the team. Restores HP to the whole team.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate Break-falls.

1039305.name: Illusion Bubble
1039305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and gains Divine Grace.

1139101.name: Subzero Crystal
1139101.simpleDesc:
Summons ice crystals to attack the enemies in front, dealing Ice DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains Energy periodically.

1139201.name: Zero Mansard
1139201.simpleDesc:
Summons an ice spike to attack the target, dealing Ice DMG. Taps on the skill again a short time after the casting to cast Additional Chant.
Additional Chant: The ice spike breaks into pieces and attacks again, dealing Ice DMG and gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Mark.
Gains the following effects when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Marks is expended to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state: shortens the remaining CD of Zero Mansard. Increases Ice DMG. The more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> Marks expended, the higher the effect value.

1139202.name: Matter Frozen
1139202.simpleDesc:
Summons an icicle to pierce the locked-on enemy, dealing Ice DMG and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit. Taps on the skill again a short time after the casting to cast Additional Chant.
Additional Chant: Generates a continuous ice blast around the enemies hit, dealing Ice DMG and gaining <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Mark.
Gains the following effects when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks are expended to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state: Shortens the remaining CD of Matter Frozen. Reduces the Ice RES of enemies hit. The more <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks expended, the higher the effect value.

1139203.name: Snow Echo
1139203.simpleDesc:
Casts the previous skill again and grants the corresponding Marks after casting Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen. Said casting will also come with the corresponding Additional Chant follow-up attack. When owing <color=#E78300>2</color> of either Mark, Snow Echo is replaced by Silver Frost.
Silver Frost: Expends all Marks for the corresponding effects when cast. Fires three silver frosts in the direction of the locked-on target, dealing Ice DMG to enemies along the way. Resets the CD of Zero Mansard and Matter Frozen and enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113903)>Edgy</material>: Disables Skill 3 and cannot gain any <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113901)>Snowy</material> or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113902)>Icy</material> Marks when in Edgy state. Zero Mansard or Matter Frozen attack will be followed up with the corresponding Additional Chant attack.

1139209.name: Frosty Starfall
1139209.simpleDesc:
Summons multiple icicles to attack the locked-on enemy, dealing Ice DMG. Shortens the remaining CD of Skill 1 and Skill 2 of the whole team depending on the type and number of Marks owned.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when Freeze is inflicted on the enemy.

1035101.name: Croc Rampage
1035101.simpleDesc:
Launches a swift attack on the enemy using Croc Blades, dealing Water DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1035201.name: Hunt Down
1035201.simpleDesc: Dashes forward and strikes the enemies in the path, dealing Water DMG. Casts the finishing blow, dealing Water DMG when the sprint ends or when the skill button is tapped again.

1035202.name: Roar of the Nile
1035202.simpleDesc: Thrusts the Croc Blades into the ground and summons six circular waves to attack the enemies nearby, dealing Water DMG.

1035203.name: Wavebreaker
1035203.simpleDesc: Uses Croc Blades to get a hold on the enemy, then throws them to the ground, dealing Water DMG. Deals Water DMG directly when an enemy cannot be captured.

1035209.name: Howling Tornado
1035209.simpleDesc:
Leaps up and transforms into a roaring tornado which smashes into the enemy, dealing Water DMG. Increases melee DMG of all teammates when the attack hits.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when a human enemy is defeated.

1035305.name: Swamp Water
1035305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and gains Rage.

1037101.name: Precision Shot
1037101.simpleDesc:
Fires off a stream of shots at the locked-on enemy, dealing Shadow DMG.

Passive:
The further the Mod is from the enemy, the higher the DMG dealt.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1037201.name: Instant Shadow
1037201.simpleDesc: Takes a leap back and fires two dim balls of light at the target enemy, dealing Shadow DMG.

1037202.name: Double Scattershot
1037202.simpleDesc: Fires off two waves of arrows in quick succession, dealing Shadow DMG to enemies nearby.

1037203.name: Striking Arrow
1037203.simpleDesc: Fires a ranged scattershot three times, then draws the bow again to fire a precise shot at the target, dealing Shadow DMG.

1037231.name: Phantom Blast
1037231.simpleDesc: Launches a power attack using glove, dealing Shadow DMG.

1037209.name: EverNight Meteor
1037209.simpleDesc:
Leaps into the air and fires a powerful shot at the target enemy, dealing Shadow DMG. Grants Rage to all teammates. Gains a passive bonus (based on how far away from the enemy).

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1027101.name: Anchor Slam
1027101.simpleDesc: Attacks the enemy with the anchor again and again, dealing Ice DMG.

1027201.name: Careless Barge
1027201.simpleDesc:
Dashes and strikes at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1027202.name: Ice Arc
1027202.simpleDesc:
Swings the anchor to attack the target with one heavy hit, dealing Ice DMG. Charges by holding down the skill button. Skill is immediately charged to full if the target enemy is in Freeze during skill cast.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces each time a skill hits.

1027221.name: Stormy Counter
1027221.simpleDesc:
Within a certain period of time after the Dodge effect being triggered or a successful Break-fall while Dodge is not in cooldown, tap on Normal Attack to launch a skill attack using the anchor and deal Ice DMG, as well as inflict Freeze on enemies hit.
When in Break-fall or when Dodge is triggered, Ice DMG dealt is increased.

1027203.name: Icy Spike
1027203.simpleDesc: Swings the anchor to attack enemies with a row of ice spikes, dealing Ice DMG and inflicting Freeze on enemies hit.

1027209.name: Ice Whale Jump
1027209.simpleDesc:
Dives into the ground and moves towards the locked-on enemy. Jumps and attacks at the destination, dealing Ice DMG. Inflicts Freeze on enemies hit.

Grants a Ultimate Skill charge when Freeze is inflicted on the enemy.

1127101.name: Inundate
1127101.simpleDesc:
Brandishes Countertide Whalesong and calls upon a group of sea creatures to help with the attack, dealing Water DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace every time when certain normal attack hits.

1127201.name: Leapin' Krakens
1127201.simpleDesc:
Summons an ocean wave that surges forward, out of which jump various sea creatures that attack the enemy, dealing Water DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark upon skill cast. Increases healing effect for every hit with Leapin' Krakens. The DMG of Leapin' Krakens increases as the healing effect increases.
After the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark is expended, this effect will last for a certain period before being removed.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace upon each skill hit.

1127202.name: Tide Summon
1127202.simpleDesc:
Opens up the Access Key to summon two sea creatures on the spot, dealing AoE Water DMG while they are on the battlefield. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong</material> Mark upon skill cast. Increases Crit DMG on every skill hit with Tide Summon. The DMG of Tide Summon increases as the Crit DMG increases.
After the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong</material> Mark is expended, this effect will last for a certain period before being removed.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace upon each skill hit.

1127203.name: Undercurrent
1127203.simpleDesc:
Gains Traces immediately if the current Traces are insufficient. Replaces Undercurrent with Azure Aid when Traces are enough.
Azure Aid: Unlocks the power of Access Key to create a ring of healing, which restores HP to all allies within range. Skill cast expends all available Traces and grants additional skill effects.
Expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112701)>Countertide</material> Mark deals DMG to the locked-on enemy. The DMG increases as the healing effect increases.
All nearby allies take less DMG when expending the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(112702)>Whalesong Mark</material>. The DMG Reduction increases as the Crit DMG increases.

1127209.name: Herd Immunity
1127209.simpleDesc:
Summons the power of the sea to protect those around them. Reduces DMG taken for all team members. Grants the following effects within a certain period of time: The next cast of Azure Aid grants Traces, and the remaining CD of Azure Aid is shortened when it is cast. 

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate receives healing.

1028101.name: Thunderwave
1028101.simpleDesc:
Swings Mjölnir to attack the enemy continuously, dealing Thunder DMG. Following up its derivative skill with a normal attack will start the normal attack from the fourth strike and grants Unyielding during the follow-up.

Passive:
Every hit landed with a normal attack or skill attack grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> points, which are expended over time. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> increases the Independent DMG dealt by the Mod.
Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy</material> state when casting a derivative skill, with effect duration extended based on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> points owned.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102802)>Thunder Frenzy:</material> Becomes Invincible for a short time upon entering this state. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> will not be automatically expended during this state, and Mod deals more Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace when a hit is landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack.

1028201.name: Quivers Underground
1028201.simpleDesc:
Rushes toward the enemy with Mjölnir in hand, dealing Thunder DMG. For a short time after skill cast, skill is replaced by the derivative skill: Hammerstrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Quivers Underground.
Hammerstrike: Attacks surrounding enemies with Mjölnir, expending Traces to deal Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace when a hit is landed with Quivers Underground.

1028202.name: Rumbles Faraway
1028202.simpleDesc:
Swings Mjölnir wildly, pulling in nearby enemies for a short time and dealing Thunder DMG. Within a short time after skill cast, this skill will be replaced by the derivative skill: Rumblestrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Rumbles Faraway.
Rumblestrike: Spins Mjölnir and then smashes it into the ground, expending Traces to deal Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace when a hit is landed with Rumbles Faraway.

1028203.name: Trembles Deep Within
1028203.simpleDesc:
Swings Mjölnir, then smashes it into the ground, dealing Thunder DMG. Within a short time after skill cast, this skill will be replaced by the derivative skill: Tremblestrike, which can only be cast as a follow-up to Trembles Deep Within.
Tremblestrike: Swings Mjölnir and smashes it into the ground again, expending Traces to deal Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace when a hit is landed with Trembles Deep Within.

1028209.name: Fury at Twilight
1028209.simpleDesc:
Summons the Járngreipr gloves that unleash the power of raging thunder, and enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material> state. Grants all Trace Mods on the team a Skill DMG boost.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material>: Grants Control Immunity and DMG Immunity, though Mod may not move or cast skills or Dodge. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> buffs are raised to max. Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> with no further automatic expenditure, then grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> periodically thereafter. Keep tapping the attack button to keep casting skill attacks with Járngreipr which deal Thunder DMG. The second strike of the attack also sends down five thunderbolts in front. Unleashes one last fist attack automatically when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material> is at max, then exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102803)>Thunder Rage</material> state.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge based on the number of Traces expended by the Mod or a teammate.

1028305.name: Elusive Bolt
1028305.simpleDesc:
Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102801)>Thundercloud</material>. Following up an Extremity Dodge with a normal attack will start the normal attack from the fourth strike and grants Unyielding.
Dodge effect: Zero Time.

1019101.name: Lance Flurry
1019101.simpleDesc: Launches an attack on the enemy in front with the lance, dealing Wind DMG.

1019201.name: Winged Lance
1019201.simpleDesc:
Leaps into the air and attacks the enemy with the lance, dealing Wind DMG. Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101901)>Sacred Gale Crystals</material> that appear in front when landing, dealing Wind DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1019202.name: Surging Wind
1019202.simpleDesc:
Summons a rapidly moving hurricane in front, dealing Wind DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1019203.name: Breach
1019203.simpleDesc: Deals Wind DMG to enemies depending on the number of Traces expended at skill cast.

1019233.name: Breakthrough
1019233.simpleDesc: Deals Wind DMG to enemies depending on the number of Traces expended at skill cast. Increases the Crit Rate and Crit DMG of the skill when only one enemy is hit.

1019305.name: Slipstream
1019305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Gathers the enemies nearby and interrupts the enemy's attacks.

1019209.name: Wind Drill
1019209.simpleDesc:
Dashes for a certain distance and attacks enemies in the path, dealing Wind DMG and changing the Modifying Level to <color=#E78300>Ω</color>. Enters Zero Time when an enemy is defeated using Wind Drill.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate expends Traces.

1119101.name: Spear Jive
1119101.simpleDesc:
Brandishes the twin spears and attacks the enemies, dealing Thunder DMG.

Passive:
Increases Thunder DMG dealt as Wind DMG increases.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1119201.name: Shifting Winds
1119201.simpleDesc:
Brandishes her spears, dealing Thunder DMG while switching between the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>. Grants Unyielding when casting a skill while in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>.
Regardless of whether Shifting Winds is in CD or if it is replaced with Shifting Squall, tap on this skill button when casting Storm Howl, Whirlwind Whisk, or Shifting Squall, or when launching follow-up attacks or counterattacks to immediately switch the Mod's stance.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material> and hit by the enemy while casting Storm Howl or Whirlwind Whisk, blocks the damage and triggers a counterattack, dealing Thunder DMG and granting Invincibility. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111904)>Hillshook</material> Marks gained upon hit.
When the Mark count is at max, replaces Shifting Winds with Shifting Squall.
Shifting Squall: Expends all Marks to deal Thunder DMG.

1119202.name: Storm Howl
1119202.simpleDesc: Dashes forward while brandishing the twin spears, then launches a series of ferocious stabs at the enemy, dealing Thunder DMG. Hitting an enemy while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> triggers a follow-up attack, dealing Thunder DMG, and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> Marks upon each hit. The follow-up attack will stop if the Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>.

1119203.name: Whirlwind Whisk
1119203.simpleDesc: Imbues the twin spears with the divine power of lightning and brandishes them in a wide area. The spears then turn into dozens of phantoms that attack the enemy from above, dealing Thunder DMG. Hitting an enemy while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111901)>attack stance</material> triggers a follow-up attack, dealing Thunder DMG, and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111903)>Lightning Rod</material> Marks upon each hit. The follow-up attack will stop if Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111902)>defensive stance</material>.

1119209.name: Storm Break
1119209.simpleDesc:
Deals Thunder DMG. Increases the Combat Resources charge speed of all teammates upon hit. Increases Crit DMG for every normal attack hit. Removes the Crit DMG boost when the Combat Resources charge speed boost expires.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate expends Combat Resources successfully.

1011101.name: Hell Slash
1011101.simpleDesc: Swings the scythe continuously to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.

1011201.name: Forbidden Blade
1011201.simpleDesc:
Uses the scythe to slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. When Forbidden Blade is in CD, tap on the skill again to launch another Forbidden Blade strike while losing some HP. Hits landed with this second cast of Forbidden Blade deal more DMG and grant Ultimate Skill charge. Can be used once every CD.
Use of Forbidden Blade does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1011202.name: Scythe-erang
1011202.simpleDesc:
Throws the scythe at the target and retrieves it, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1011203.name: Judgment Scythe
1011203.simpleDesc: Unleashes a powerful slash attack on the locked-on enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Recovers HP when an enemy is defeated using the skill.

1011209.name: Soul Spiral Dance
1011209.simpleDesc:
Leaps into the air, throws the scythe at the target and retrieves it, dealing Physical DMG. Recovers HP every time the attack hits.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate is attacked.

1013101.name: Blazing Fist
1013101.simpleDesc:
Launches a stream of attacks on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG.
Fire Warp: Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Unleashes a linear attack, dealing Fire DMG. Reduces the Fire RES of enemies hit when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state.
Fire Warp (Enhanced): Each time <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state ends, the next cast of Fire Warp is enhanced. Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Unleashes a heavy fist attack, dealing Fire DMG.
Using Fire Warp does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants Energy periodically.

1013111.name: Blazing Fist
1013111.simpleDesc:
Launches a stream of attacks on the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG.
Fire Warp: Hold down on the Normal Attack button to cast this skill. Unleashes a linear attack, dealing Fire DMG. Reduces the Fire RES of enemies hit when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state.
Fire Warp (Enhanced): Each time <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state starts or extends, the next cast of Fire Warp is enhanced, and this skill can only be cast when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state by holding down on the Normal Attack button, dealing Fire DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Gains Energy. Reduces the Fire RES of enemies hit.
Using Fire Warp does not interrupt normal attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants Energy periodically.

1013201.name: Fury of Asura
1013201.simpleDesc: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state and gains increased Fire DMG. Extends out to the target's surroundings and attacks, dealing Fire DMG.

1013202.name: Imprisoned
1013202.simpleDesc: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state and gains increased Fire DMG. Casts a forcefield that traps enemies within range. Deals Fire DMG to nearby enemies when the forcefield explodes.

1013203.name: Earth Shatter
1013203.simpleDesc: Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101301)>Flamefetter</material> state and gains increased Fire DMG. Opens a crack in the ground beneath the locked-on enemy, and draws all surrounding enemies to it. Attacks enemies within range, dealing Fire DMG.

1013209.name: Fire and Brimstone
1013209.simpleDesc:
Leaps up and pounds on the target location with Rāhu, dealing Fire DMG. Reduces the Fire RES of enemies hit.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1056101.name: Thunder Fist
1056101.simpleDesc:
Unleashes fist and kick strikes against the target, dealing Thunder DMG.
Enhances Thunder Fist when landing a hit using Shinra: Ragestomp or Shinra: Thunderweave.
The last strike of the enhanced version of Thunder Fist summons an additional lightning strike against enemies within range, dealing Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains Energy periodically.

1056201.name: Shinra: Ragestomp
1056201.simpleDesc:
Delivers two kicks to the locked-on enemy, dealing Thunder DMG.
Enhances the skill when landing a hit with the final strike of a normal attack or Shinra: Thousandbolt.
The second strike of the enhanced version of Shinra: Ragestomp also inflicts Stun on enemies hit.

1056202.name: Shinra: Thunderweave
1056202.simpleDesc:
Attacks the locked-on enemy with a flurry of kicks, dealing Thunder DMG.
Enhances the skill when landing a hit with the last strike of a normal attack or Shinra: Thousandbolt.
Tap repeatedly with the enhanced version of Shinra: Thunderweave to get additional kicks.

1056203.name: Shinra: Thousandbolt
1056203.simpleDesc:
Unleashes a string of attacks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Thunder DMG. And then launches one last punch to deal Thunder DMG again.
Enhances the skill when landing a hit using Shinra: Ragestomp or Shinra: Thunderweave.
The final punch of the enhanced version of Shinra: Thousandbolt automatically charges up, and can be unleashed with a subsequent tap or when charge is full, dealing Thunder DMG depending on how many stacks it has.

1056209.name: Thunderflash
1056209.simpleDesc:
Gathers lightning energy and fires in the target direction, dealing Thunder DMG. Increases DMG of all Energy Mods on the team upon skill cast.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Dodge.

1056305.name: Shinra: Flight
1056305.simpleDesc:
When Shinra: Thousandbolt is charging, triggering Extremity Dodge will not interrupt the charge and the Mod may continue with it when they are not hit.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time.

1058101.name: Fiery Dance
1058101.simpleDesc:
Slashes the enemies, dealing Fire DMG. Reduces DMG taken each time an attack hits.

Passive:
Tap on the Normal Attack button after the skill hits to cast the skill: Fiery Dance: Alt.
Fiery Dance: Alt: Deals Fire DMG. Grants Unyielding. Every <color=#E78300>3</color> times Fiery Dance: Alt hit, the skill: Fiery Dance: Burst is triggered.
Fiery Dance: Burst: Deals Fire DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants Energy periodically. Grants Energy when Fiery Dance: Alt hits.

1058201.name: Ashen: Blacken
1058201.simpleDesc:
Unleashes two sweeping attacks, dealing Fire DMG.
Ashen: Blacken: Alt inflicts Fire DMG and then the skill will be replaced by the derivative skill Secret Sword: Blacken.
Secret Sword: Blacken: Unleashes an upwards attack, dealing Fire DMG.

1058202.name: Ashen: Charge
1058202.simpleDesc:
Rushes and stabs at the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG.
Ashen: Charge: Alt inflicts Fire DMG and then the skill will be replaced by the derivative skill Secret Sword: Charge.
Secret Sword: Charge: Cross-slashes a total of two times, dealing Fire DMG.

1058203.name: Ashen: Smelt
1058203.simpleDesc:
Swings the nodachi upwards and casts a sword wave, dealing Fire DMG. Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material> state and resets the CD of Ashen: Blacken, Ashen: Blacken: Alt, Ashen: Charge, and Ashen: Charge: Alt.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105801)>Wildfire</material>: Ashen: Blacken is replaced with Ashen: Blacken: Alt and Ashen: Charge is replaced with Ashen: Charge: Alt. Every normal attack is regarded as a skill attack.

1058209.name: Ashen Destruction
1058209.simpleDesc:
Launches a fire wave around using the nodachi, dealing Fire DMG. Increases the team's Fire DMG upon hit.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when Dodge is triggered by the Mod or a Teammate.

1058305.name: Ashen: Slag
1058305.simpleDesc:
Gains Energy when Extremity Dodge is triggered.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time.

1158101.name: The Karasugo Slash
1158101.simpleDesc:
Swings the katana to launch a 5-strike attack, dealing Fire DMG.

Passive:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>: Increases the Mod's DMG dealt to Visbanes according to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>'s level. Increases the Non-DoT Crit DMG and Skill Base DMG of a follow-up Madoibi Flicker or Flashfire Execution attack.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1158201.name: Madoibi Flicker
1158201.simpleDesc: Sprints forward and slashes, dealing Fire DMG. In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state, this skill can be used as a follow-up attack to leap into the air and dashes forward with the katana, dealing Fire DMG. (Up to a number of times equal to the current <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material> level.)

1158202.name: Smoldering Heart
1158202.simpleDesc:
Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state. Sheathes the katana and continuously deals DMG to self to charge up the Madoibi. Once fully charged, clears the charge bar and levels up <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>.
As <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115802)>Heartsear</material>'s level goes up, deals Fire DMG to nearby enemies.

1158203.name: Flashfire Execution
1158203.simpleDesc: Can only use as a follow-up attack when in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115801)>Smelt</material> state. Instantly slashes multiples times in all directions, then finishes off with a fierce downward strike, dealing Fire DMG. Recovers HP once the skill ends.

1158209.name: Fuchsia Fireblade
1158209.simpleDesc:
Whirls the katana to create a sea of fire and enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115803)>Heartsear: Scourge</material> state, dealing Fire DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115803)>Heartsear: Scourge</material>: Automatically charges up the Madoibi.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate loses HP.

1158305.name: Phosphorus Storm
1158305.simpleDesc:
Inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> on the Mod and attacker when Extremity Dodge is triggered.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material>: Mod can block DMG from an enemy inflicted with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material>. Defeating an enemy in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state removes the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115804)>Kindle</material> state from the Mod.
Dodge effect: Increases charge rate of the charge bar.

1059101.name: Rapid Shots
1059101.simpleDesc:
Fires off a stream of shots at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG.

Passive:
Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> every time when certain hits landed on the enemy.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains Energy periodically.

1059201.name: Solar Bombardment
1059201.simpleDesc: Leaps to the back, then fires three times at the target, dealing Light DMG.

1059202.name: Thorn of Light
1059202.simpleDesc:
Dashes at the enemy and fires spinning shots, dealing Light DMG.
When owning <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> can be expended for a follow-up attack in a certain time after Thorn of Light is cast.
Following attack: Leaps into the air and fires a light arrow at the target, dealing Light DMG. The follow-up attack may also be used when in the air and owning at least one <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>.

1059203.name: Interweaving Light
1059203.simpleDesc:
Fires four light arrows, each arrow attacking enemies in its path and dealing Light DMG.
When owning <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material> can be expended for a follow-up attack in a certain time after Interweaving Light is cast.
Following attack: Leaps into the air and fires a light arrow at a nearby enemy, dealing Light DMG. When an enemy in the center zone is hit, they take more DMG. The follow-up attack may also be used when in the air and owning at least one <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>.

1059209.name: Ray of Luminosity
1059209.simpleDesc:
Dashes at the locked-on target quickly, then leaps into the air and fires a single light arrow, dealing Light DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrows</material>, and resets the CD of Dodge for all teammates.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when Dodge is triggered by the Mod or a Teammate.

1059305.name: Flickering Light
1059305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105901)>Solar Arrow</material>.

1060101.name: Kunlun Move
1060101.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG.

Passive:
The initial phase of each strike of a Normal Attack has a brief window to launch Crashing Spear as a counterattack upon being attacked.
Crashing Spear: Deals Light DMG; becomes Invincible during use.
Flurry Speardance: Deals Light DMG. Gains Super Armor during use and takes less DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when Normal Attacks hit or when a counterattack is triggered.

1060111.name: Kunlun Move
1060111.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG.

Passive:
The initial phase of each strike of a Normal Attack has a brief window. If the Mod is attacked during this time, launch Crashing Spear as a counterattack if the Mod is not in range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, or launch Crashing Mountain if the Mod is in range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>.
Crashing Spear: Deals Light DMG; becomes Invincible during use.
Crashing Mountain: Recovers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material>, dealing Light DMG; becomes Invincible during use.
Flurry Speardance: Deals Light DMG. Gains Super Armor during use and takes less DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when Normal Attacks hit or when a counterattack is triggered.

1060201.name: Counterspear
1060201.simpleDesc: Gathers enemies and deals Light DMG.

1060203.name: Spear Array
1060203.simpleDesc:
Can only be cast when Rage is full. Expends all Rage and deals Light DMG to the surroundings. Activates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>: Gathers enemies within <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>'s range periodically. When Luwu is within the range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, she gains Unyielding and takes less DMG. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> is active, a certain number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material> will be summoned. When casting Counterspear or Roaring Tiger while Luwu is within the range of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, recalls a certain number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material> back and shortens the skill's remaining CD. While recalling the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material>, a skill attack: Spearfall will be triggered to attack locked-on enemies, dealing Light DMG.
Each <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spear</material> recalled and collected grants Luwu the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Mark. When a certain number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks have been reached, the skill will be replaced by Spear Array: Three, Spear Array: Six, and Spear Array: Nine, depending on the number reached.
Spear Array: Three: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks to deal Light DMG. If it hits, increases the Non-DoT ATK of the next casting of Spear Array: Three.
Spear Array: Six: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks to deal Light DMG. Gains Super Armor during cast and takes less DMG. If hit while casting Spear Array: Six, the skill's Non-DoT ATK increases.
Spear Array: Nine: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106003)>Spearsoul</material> Marks to deal Light DMG. There is a short dodge window at the beginning phase of Spear Array: Nine. The skill's Base DMG increases when targeting enemies with HP lower than a certain percentage. The skill's ATK increases when in Zero Time or Modified Mode.
When all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material> are collected, deactivates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material>, and the next Normal Attack is replaced by the skill attack: Flurry Speardance. If <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106001)>Spearsky</material> ends and there are still uncollected <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106002)>spears</material>, Luwu recovers a certain amount of Rage.

1060209.name: Supreme Authority
1060209.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time.

1041101.name: Sword Majalis
1041101.simpleDesc:
Swings the greatsword continuously, dealing Physical DMG.

Passive:
When Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgement</material> occurs in the latter half of each normal attack strike, Adagio Vibrato, Moderato Legato and Presto Tremolo. (A follow-on attack dealt at the right time is determined Harmonious.) Grants the Unyielding effect and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack each time a strike is judged as Harmonious. The duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> is reset when an attack is not judged as Harmonious. A Sonic Boom occurs when a normal attack is judged as Harmonious, dealing DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonious strikes do not interrupt the normal attack strike count.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace upon normal attack hits when Mod is not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state.

1041201.name: Adagio Vibrato
1041201.simpleDesc: Deals Physical DMG. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>3</color>, deals more Physical DMG, and restores HP after a hit lands. While in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, an Adagio Vibrato cast and judged as Harmonious increases DMG dealt.

1041202.name: Moderato Legato
1041202.simpleDesc: Deals Physical DMG. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>5</color>, deals more Physical DMG, and inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit. While in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, a Moderato Legato cast and judged as Harmonious increases DMG dealt.

1041203.name: Concerto Chordblade
1041203.simpleDesc:
Skill may only be cast when Divine Grace is full. Deals Physical DMG to surrounding enemies, triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, resets the CD of Adagio Vibrato, Moderato Legato and Presto Tremolo, and replaces Concerto Chordblade with Presto Tremolo.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material>: Expends Divine Grace intermittently. When Divine Grace is used up, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state ends and Concerto Chordblade goes into CD.
Presto Tremolo: Deals Physical DMG. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count is a multiple of <color=#E78300>7</color>, deals more Physical DMG, with each stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> present increasing DMG dealt by the Mod. Increases the DMG dealt by Presto Tremolo when it is judged as Harmonious.

1041209.name: Convallaria Resonance
1041209.simpleDesc:
Skill casting restores Divine Grace to full, resets the existing <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104103)>Harmony</material> stack count, and triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state. During this <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, a Sonic Boom also occurs around the teammates whenever a normal attack is judged as Harmonious. Skill casting also increases all teammates' normal attack DMG.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when Stun is inflicted on the enemy.

1041305.name: Figure at Large
1041305.simpleDesc:
Casting Dodge does not interrupt the strike count of normal attacks. When Mod is in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104101)>Hummingblade</material> state, Extremity Dodge either triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104102)>Harmony Judgment</material> or resets the current judgment and starts a new one.
Dodge effect: Deals Physical DMG to the attacker and inflicts Stun on them.

1042101.name: La Danse Macabre
1042101.simpleDesc:
Controls two puppets that take turns to attack the enemy, Leuce with sharp claws and Mintha with her armored fists, dealing Shadow DMG. Launches attack with puppet strings instead when Leuce and Mintha cannot be controlled, dealing Shadow DMG.

Passive:
Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic Mark</material> at intervals when having at least <color=#E78300>25</color> but no more than <color=#E78300>75</color> Divine Grace. Increases Crit Rate and Crit DMG depending on <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic Mark</material> owned.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Expends Divine Grace when Leuce lands a hit with a normal attack or a skill, and gains Divine Grace when Mintha lands a hit with a normal attack or a skill. The expenditure/gain of Divine Grace from Leuce and Mintha is not affected by other attributes.

1042201.name: Shadow Dance Twirl
1042201.simpleDesc:
Switches the puppets, and the next time Puppet Show: Prelude or Puppet Show: March is cast, Leuce and Mintha both go into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner</material> mode. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark count is at max, hold down on the Normal Attack button to expend all of the Marks, which causes Leuce and Mintha to go into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material> mode.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104203)>Dance Duo</material>: Increases the Mod's Crit Rate, Crit DMG, and Fixed DMG. Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG. When in Dance Duo state, skills cannot be cast, no <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Marks are granted, and Leuce and Mintha cannot gain or expend any Divine Grace.
Casting Shadow Dance Twirl when Dodge is not in CD will also trigger a Dodge effect with the locked-on enemy, after which the Dodge effect goes into CD.

1042202.name: Puppet Show: Prelude
1042202.simpleDesc:
When Leuce is the puppet being controlled, deals Shadow DMG and inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104205)>Darksea</material> on the enemy.
When Mintha is the puppet being controlled, deals Shadow DMG and inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104204)>Deathswamp</material> on the enemy.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner:</material> Replaces Puppet Show: Prelude with Puppet Show: Waltz, in which Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG.

1042203.name: Puppet Show: March
1042203.simpleDesc:
When Leuce is the puppet being controlled, deals Shadow DMG and slightly drags surrounding enemies.
When Mintha is the puppet being controlled, deals Shadow DMG and slightly drags surrounding enemies.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104202)>Dance Partner:</material> Replaces Puppet Show: March with Puppet Show: Rondo, in which Leuce and Mintha launch a joint attack, dealing Shadow DMG.

1042209.name: Puppet Show: End
1042209.simpleDesc:
Deals Shadow DMG, and restores Mod's Divine Grace to <color=#E78300>50</color> every few seconds for a certain period of time upon Ultimate Skill cast. Increases all teammates' Crit Rate and Crit DMG depending on <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104201)>Chthonic</material> Mark owned.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate crits.

1042305.name: Shadow Puppet Dodge
1042305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Reduces the attacker's speed significantly.

1038101.name: Phoenix Flame
1038101.simpleDesc: The Phoenix transforms into several fire birds to attack the enemy, with the number of phoenixes increasing over time before the attack ends in an AoE explosion, dealing Fire DMG.

1038201.name: Sacred Flame Dive
1038201.simpleDesc:
Summons The Phoenix which flies swiftly along the target trajectory, dealing Fire DMG to enemies in its path.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1038202.name: Blazing Embrace
1038202.simpleDesc:
Uses the scepter to direct a blast at the target's feet, dealing AoE Fire DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1038221.name: Burning Dance
1038221.simpleDesc:
Summons The Phoenix to attack the target, dealing Fire DMG. Increases DMG to those afflicted with Scorch.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1038203.name: Solar Blaze
1038203.simpleDesc: Starts a storm of fire around, dealing Fire DMG to enemies based on the number of Traces used.

1038209.name: Feather of Fury
1038209.simpleDesc:
Summons The Phoenix to the front that continuously gathers the enemies nearby, dealing Fire DMG.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy is inflicted with Scorch.

1038305.name: Flowing Fire
1038305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and inflicts Scorch on the attacker.

1084101.name: Runic Sharpness
1084101.simpleDesc:
Swings the Runic Blade continuously at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack hits.

1084201.name: Rapid Stab
1084201.simpleDesc:
Stabs forward a certain distance, dealing Physical DMG to enemies in the path. Replaces Rapid Stab with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material> after it is cast two times.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>: Deals Physical DMG to enemies in the path.
Clears all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Marks</material> if the skill hits an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> is hit by <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>.

1084212.name: Quick Stab
1084212.simpleDesc:
Stabs forward a certain distance, dealing Physical DMG to enemies in the path. Increases DMG dealt when casting the skill. Replaces Quick Stab with Enlightening after being cast two times.
Enlightening: Attacks enemies along the way, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when casting the skill. Grants Divine Grace when an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> is hit by Enlightening.

1084202.name: Swift Slash
1084202.simpleDesc:
Slashes at the enemies around, dealing Physical DMG and applying the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> to enemies hit. Resets the CD of Skill 1.
Increases the Crit Rate landed on enemies with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material> with other skills significantly.

1084203.name: Sword Shade
1084203.simpleDesc:
Unleashes light blades towards the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Resets the CD of Skill 1. Clears all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Marks</material> if the skill hits an enemy with a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108401)>Runic Mark</material>. When Divine Grace is at max, the skill is replaced by Raychaser Slash.
Raychaser Slash: Expends all Divine Grace to use all summoned swords in a wide-area attack, dealing Physical DMG. Increases skill Crit Rate significantly and resets the CD of Skill 1.

1084209.name: Decisive Slash
1084209.simpleDesc:
Transforms Runic Blade into the Blade of Destiny, which is then used to attack the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Increases the Mod Index Multiplier.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1184101.name: Sword and Shield
1184101.simpleDesc:
Uses sword and shield to attack the target continuously, dealing Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when the third shield strike of a normal attack hits.

1184201.name: Shield Throw
1184201.simpleDesc:
Brandishes the shield and hurls it to the locked-on enemy, dealing Thunder DMG. Enemies hit by the flying shield take Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace every time when the flying shield hits enemy.

1184202.name: Counter Strike
1184202.simpleDesc:
Raises the shield to defend by holding down the button, dealing Thunder DMG. A strike is unleashed when the hold is released or when the time is up, dealing Thunder DMG. When hit while the shield is up, the DMG otherwise taken is blocked and a powerful counterattack is unleashed, dealing Thunder DMG and entering Zero Time.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace upon successful block.

1184203.name: Protection of Faith
1184203.simpleDesc: Gathers all the power and leaps into the air, then smashes downwards, dealing Thunder DMG with all Divine Grace expended. Grants a Shield. Increases shield value based on the Divine Grace expended.

1184209.name: Stalwart Smash
1184209.simpleDesc:
Slams into the locked-on enemy while holding the shield, dealing Thunder DMG. Collides enemies in the path, dealing Thunder DMG. Grants Divine Grace. Grants Ultimate Skill charge to all teammates.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1080101.name: Icefield Hunter
1080101.simpleDesc:
Swings the axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1080111.name: Frostbite
1080111.simpleDesc:
Swings the axe continuously to attack the enemy, dealing Ice DMG. Normal attacks have a certain chance of inflicting Freeze on enemies in front. After a normal attack hits an enemy in Freeze, additional Rage is granted. After a normal attack hits, Ice DMG will be dealt to enemies in front who are not directly hit by this normal attack.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1080201.name: Frozen Land
1080201.simpleDesc: Swings the axe to attack the enemies nearby, dealing Ice DMG. The second strike inflicts Freeze on enemies hit.

1080202.name: Cold Vortex
1080202.simpleDesc: Spins with the axe to attack enemies continuously, dealing Ice DMG.

1080203.name: Polar Strike
1080203.simpleDesc: Leaps up and unleashes a mighty cleave at the target, dealing Ice DMG. Resets the CD of the skill when an enemy is defeated with Polar Strike.

1080305.name: Winter Frost
1080305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Increases Ice DMG.

1080209.name: Avalanche
1080209.simpleDesc:
Deals Ice DMG to enemies. Reduces the Ice RES of enemies hit.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy is inflicted with Freeze.

1081101.name: Waverender Slice
1081101.simpleDesc:
Brandishes the Typhon Sword carried on the Waverender and attacks the enemy repeatedly, dealing Ice DMG. Hold down the button to unleash the charged attack Frostbreak following any strike in a normal attack, dealing Ice DMG. The Mod is not affected by Knockup.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, launching a normal attack automatically locks on to the target and fires two Piercer tracking missiles, dealing Ice DMG. Fires two additional Piercer tracking missiles when the locked-on enemy is in Freeze.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when a normal attack or Frostbreak hits an enemy when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, both moving and drifting grant Divine Grace.

1081201.name: Cold Front
1081201.simpleDesc:
Uses the Typhon Sword to slash the enemies in front at high speed, dealing Ice DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark upon every hit. Ice DMG and the DMG of charged skills increase depending on the amount of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Marks. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, Cold Front is replaced by Polar Blizzard.
Polar Blizzard: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Marks to fire Freezer tracking missiles at the target, dealing Ice DMG and inflicting Freeze to enemies within the explosion's area of effect.

1081202.name: Flash Freeze
1081202.simpleDesc:
