Charges forward at high speed with assistance from the Waverender vessel while slashing furiously, forming ice spikes and dealing Ice DMG. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>, Flash Freeze is replaced by Crystal Smash.
Crystal Smash: Casts only when Divine Grace is full. Expends all Divine Grace to unleash a dash attack at the locked-on enemy with a short window to trigger Dodge, dealing Ice DMG. Increases the launch speed of Piercer tracking missiles upon skill cast.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when Flash Freeze hits.

1081203.name: Cruise Mode
1081203.simpleDesc:
Triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> for Waverender by expending all Divine Grace when Divine Grace is full.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>: Grants Super Armor and disables the use of Glacier Age. To change the direction of Waverender quickly, make a wide turn to "drift" on the water. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material> ends when using the skill again or when its duration runs out, clearing all Divine Grace. Then, disappears momentarily beneath the ice and emerges again at a point close to the target, dealing Ice DMG.

1081209.name: Glacier Age
1081209.simpleDesc:
The Waverender's engines are at full power to supply the Typhon Sword. Unleashes a frost blast after charging briefly, dealing Ice DMG to surrounding enemies. Increases the Charge Skill DMG of all teammates upon skill cast.

Grants a Ultimate Skill charge when an enemy goes into Control RES.

1081305.name: Iron on the Waves
1081305.simpleDesc:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108102)>Cruise Mode</material>:
Holding down on the Dodge button when not moving: Expends Dodge Energy to generate a barrier on site, reducing DMG taken. Expends Dodge Energy again when the barrier is active to block the damage of the first attack taken. When having an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark active, canceling the tap within a short time of a successful block unleashes Frostbreak one time at the cost <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Marks, during which time the Mod is Invincible.
Dodge effect: Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108101)>Icebreaker</material> Mark.

1089101.name: Dark Tempest
1089101.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG.

Passive:
The Mod has three types of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material>.
When held, unleashing Gale Dash and Storm Rampage will expend <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material>, granting different effects:
Expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108903)>Wind Bullets - Azure</material>: When HP is full, grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108905)>Azure</material> state.
When expended <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108903)>Wind Bullets - Azure</material> hit: Restores HP depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material> expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108905)>Azure</material> state: Reduces received DMG.
Expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108903)>Wind Bullets - Amber</material>: Grants<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108906)>Amber</material> state.
When expended <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108903)>Wind Bullets - Amber</material> hit: Increases Non-DoT Skill DMG depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material> expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108906)>Amber</material> state: Increases DMG.
Expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108904)>Wind Bullets - Crimson</material>: Expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108906)>Amber</material> state grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108907)>Crimson</material> state.
When expended <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108904)>Wind Bullets - Crimson</material> hit: Increases Non-DoT Skill DMG depending on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material> expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108907)>Crimson</material> state: Increases Wind DMG.

When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material> type is <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108904)>Wind Bullets - Crimson</material>, unleashing skills will deal DMG to the Mod. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108905)>Azure</material> state, this DMG will be reduced.
During the second, fourth, and sixth normal attack strikes, Divine Grace gain is boosted. Automatically reloads when Divine Grace is full, expending the total amount to grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material> and reset the Skill CD.

1089201.name: Gale Dash
1089201.simpleDesc: Deals Wind DMG. Grants Divine Grace every time an enemy is hit if the skill is cast while the normal attack is generating Divine Grace, and doesn't interrupt normal attack strike counts. Additionally, this skill's remaining CD is reduced after it is used.

1089202.name: Storm Rampage
1089202.simpleDesc: Deals Wind DMG. Grants Divine Grace every time an enemy is hit if the skill is cast while the normal attack is generating Divine Grace, and doesn't interrupt normal attack strike counts. Additionally, this skill's remaining CD is reduced after it is used.

1089203.name: Free Alsaid
1089203.simpleDesc:
Manually reloads, dealing Wind DMG, switching <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material> type, and expending all Divine Grace to grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material>.
When this skill is not in CD, use a normal attack and quickly follow up with Gale Dash to unleash the skill and manually reload. This particular trigger does not send the skill into CD and will not interrupt the normal attack strike count. In order to not switch the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material> type, expend all Divine Grace to earn the corresponding number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material>.
When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material> type is <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108904)>Wind Bullets - Crimson</material>, this skill will be replaced with Blooming Waltz.
Blooming Waltz: Deals Wind DMG. Each time this attack hits, expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material> to decrease Wind RES of the hit enemy.

1089209.name: Wheel of Cleansing
1089209.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG, switches <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material>type, and fully restores Divine Grace.

When the Mod or a teammate uses an Ultimate Skill, Gale Dash and Storm Rampage expend <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullets</material> when unleashed to grant an Ultimate Skill charge.

1089305.name: Flowing Gale
1089305.simpleDesc:
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Grants different effects depending on <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108901)>Wind Bullet</material> type:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108902)>Wind Bullets - Azure</material>: Restores HP.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108903)>Wind Bullets - Amber</material>: Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108906)>Amber</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(108904)>Wind Bullets - Crimson</material>: Fully restores Divine Grace.

1093101.name: Chidori Strike
1093101.simpleDesc:
Uses a shinobigatana to swiftly slash at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>: A combination of two types of Hold, Heaven's Hold and Earth's Hold. Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> to cast corresponding Ninjutsu. Forming a new <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> when a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> already exists clears the existing <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>. When Divine Grace is at max, casting Ninjutsu expends not <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> but all Divine Grace.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack hits.

1093231.name: Rain of Kunai
1093231.simpleDesc:
Ninjutsu: Attacks surrounding enemies in a large area, dealing Physical DMG.
Can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Heaven and Heaven.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Rain can be cast using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range, and reducing the Physical RES of enemies hit.

1093232.name: Wondrous Thunder
1093232.simpleDesc:
Ninjutsu: Deals Thunder DMG to enemies in front.
Can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Heaven and Earth.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Thunder can be cast using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>, dealing Thunder DMG to enemies within range and reducing the Thunder RES of enemies hit.

1093233.name: Razer Whirlwind
1093233.simpleDesc:
Ninjutsu: Dashes at the enemy in front, dealing Wind DMG.
Can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Earth and Heaven.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Wind can be cast using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>, dealing Wind DMG to enemies within range and reducing the Wind RES of enemies hit.

1093236.name: Tectonic Blast
1093236.simpleDesc:
Ninjutsu: Detonates the target enemy, dealing Fire DMG and leaving a circle on the enemy that will intermittently blast, each blast dealing Fire DMG.
Can be cast using the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material> combination of Earth and Earth.

The Ultimate Skill Truth and Nothingness: Fire can be cast using <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109301)>Mudra</material>, dealing Fire DMG to enemies within range and reducing the Fire RES of enemies hit.

1093305.name: Vanish
1093305.simpleDesc:
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1094101.name: Handgonne Fantasia
1094101.simpleDesc:
Fires a series of shots at the locked-on enemy using the Magic Handgonne, dealing Shadow DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack hits.

1094201.name: Nightmare Harvest
1094201.simpleDesc:
Sprays shots at enemies in front using the Magic Handgonne, dealing Shadow DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace on every skill hit.

1094202.name: Specter Blast
1094202.simpleDesc:
Ganglati transforms into Magic Cannon form and fires a shot in the locked-on direction, dealing Shadow DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace on every skill hit.

1094203.name: Execution
1094203.simpleDesc:
Ganglati transforms into Cannon Tower form and fires multiple cannon shots in the locked-on direction, each shot expending Divine Grace and dealing Shadow DMG. Other attributes do not affect Divine Grace expenditure from cannon shots.
When in Cannon Tower form, the Mod is immune to control effects though movement, skills or the Ultimate Skill are disabled, and only rotating horizontally to aim is available. Reduces the DMG taken, and every certain amount of Max HP lost expends certain Divine Grace. Exits Cannon Tower form when Divine Grace runs out or with a manual exit.

1094209.name: Judgment From Above
1094209.simpleDesc:
Summons multiple Magic Cannons that fire in the locked-on direction. Unleashes four scattered strikes to enemies within range, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases Shadow DMG of all teammates.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1094305.name: Aether Cover
1094305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and gains Divine Grace.

1096101.name: Whirlwind Combo
1096101.simpleDesc:
Launches a series of attacks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Wind DMG.

Passive:
Moves at an increasing speed until <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> is triggered.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1096201.name: Falling Star
1096201.simpleDesc:
Launches two kicks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Wind DMG. Inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> to the locked-on enemy.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material>: Increases DMG when attacking an enemy from downwind.

1096202.name: Ride with the Wind
1096202.simpleDesc:
Moves some distance quickly.
Hold down on Ride with the Wind while moving to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> state at the cost of Rage.
Expends Rage again to cast a follow-up attack when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> state.
Follow-up attack: Delivers a powerful flying kick to the locked-on target while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109601)>Vector Acceleration</material> state, dealing Wind DMG.

1096203.name: Blue Streak
1096203.simpleDesc: Moves swiftly to launch a series of attacks, dealing Wind DMG.

1096209.name: Buster Bluster
1096209.simpleDesc:
Initiates a dash using the power of the Access Key, generating a storm at the target location which deals Wind DMG. Reduces the Wind RES of enemies hit, and inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109602)>Windchaser Mark</material> on them.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge after the Mod or a teammate crits with a normal attack.

1097101.name: Rainbow Dreams
1097101.simpleDesc:
Fires a flash of rainbow light at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains Energy periodically.

1097201.name: Counting Sheep
1097201.simpleDesc: Flings the little sheep forward. The sheep bounces and deals Light DMG to the enemy. Inflicts Shackle on any enemies hit within range.

1097202.name: Fairytale Illustrated
1097202.simpleDesc: Creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109701)>Dreamscape</material>, where all allies take less DMG.

1097221.name: Garden of Dreams
1097221.simpleDesc: Casts a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109702)>Phantascape</material>, where all allies take less DMG. Inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material> on enemies hit, dealing Shadow DMG to enemies in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109703)>Dreamland</material> state every second.

1097203.name: Hollow Dream
1097203.simpleDesc: Enters sleepwalking state and creates a Dream Bubble. In sleepwalking state, the Mod can only move slowly, restoring HP to all allies within range periodically. Hold down on the skill to charge it multiple times. The more times the skill charges, the higher its DMG. The Dream Bubble shatters when Mod stops charging, takes a hit, or when charging is at max, dealing Light DMG to surrounding enemies.

1097209.name: Wooly Lullaby
1097209.simpleDesc:
Throws the little sheep high up into the air, where it grows bigger, crashes into the targets below and explodes, dealing Light DMG to enemies within range, and inflicts Shackle on all enemies hit.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate casts Ultimate Skill.

1097305.name: Dreamgate
1097305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Deals Light DMG to the attacker.

1026101.name: Bombard
1026101.simpleDesc:
Launches a series of attacks at the locked-on enemy, dealing Fire DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack hits.

1026201.name: Bullet Hail
1026201.simpleDesc: Fires a large number of bullets in the target direction, dealing Fire DMG. Charges the skill by holding down on the button, and each charge expends Divine Grace and increases the skill DMG. Enemies hit by a fully charged Bullet Hail are also afflicted with Scorch.

1026202.name: Ground Blast
1026202.simpleDesc: Hammers into the ground, unleashing an explosion at the feet of the locked-on enemy which deals Fire DMG. Charges the skill by holding down on the button, and each charge expends Divine Grace and increases the skill DMG. Casting the skill at full charge also unleashes an additional two ring-shaped explosions of even magnitude, dealing Fire DMG.

1026203.name: Power Flame
1026203.simpleDesc: Directs a stream of flames towards the target, attacking enemies within range and dealing Fire DMG. Can move slowly while skill is being cast.

1026209.name: Overload
1026209.simpleDesc:
Hammers at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG. Grants all teammates the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102601)>Overload</material> effect.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102601)>Overload:</material> Grants Unyielding and deals Fire DMG to the attacker when the Mod is hit.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy is inflicted with Scorch.

1026305.name: Fire Sweep
1026305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: The next cast of Bullet Hail or Ground Blast automatically occurs at full charge and does not expend Divine Grace.

1099101.name: Saku Slash
1099101.simpleDesc:
Slashes at the enemy using Saku continuously, dealing Shadow DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when a normal attack hits.

1099201.name: Lunar Arc Slash
1099201.simpleDesc:
Slashes continuously and throws Saku at the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when an attack hits.

1099202.name: Sakubo: Lunar Eclipse
1099202.simpleDesc:
When Divine Grace is at max, Saku: Lunar Eclipse is replaced by Bo: Lunar Eclipse, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Lunar Eclipse: Dashes forward, dealing Shadow DMG to the enemy.
Bo: Lunar Eclipse: Deals Shadow DMG and inflicts Trauma on enemies hit.

1099203.name: Sakubo: Moonlit Night
1099203.simpleDesc:
When Divine Grace is at max, Saku: Moonlit Night is replaced by Bo: Moonlit Night, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Moonlit Night: Taps continuously to use Iaido to attack the enemy and enemies with Trauma around them, dealing Shadow DMG.
Bo: Moonlit Night: Charges to cast a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material> light blade, dealing Shadow DMG.

1099231.name: Sakubo: Final Moon
1099231.simpleDesc:
When Divine Grace is at max, resets the CD of Sakubo: Final Moon and Saku: Final Moon is replaced by Bo: Final Moon, which expends all Divine Grace when cast.
Saku: Final Moon: Taps continuously to use Iaido to attack the enemy and enemies with Trauma around them, dealing Shadow DMG.
Bo: Final Moon: Charges to cast three <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109901)>Bo</material> light blades, dealing Shadow DMG. The more times the skill charges, the higher the DMG.

1099209.name: Moonfall Strike
1099209.simpleDesc:
Slashes at the target in front, dealing Shadow DMG. Inflicts Trauma on enemies hit. Grants Divine Grace to all teammates.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy is inflicted with Trauma.

1032101.name: Royal Raid
1032101.simpleDesc: Uses the greatsword to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG. Grants max Traces when entering the battlefield.

1032106.name: Royal Blitz
1032106.simpleDesc:
Uses the greatsword to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG. Grants max Traces when entering the battlefield. When the greatsword type held is Sword of Queen, the way the normal attack takes place is changed.
Royal Blitz: Wields Sword of Queen to attack the target, dealing Light DMG.

1032201.name: Promotion
1032201.simpleDesc:
Switches to another greatsword type and deals Light DMG to enemies nearby. This skill may also be cast by tapping on the skill button during a normal attack. Doing so does not interrupt the normal attack or cause DMG either. However, the remaining CD is shortened.
Greatswords are switched in the following order: Sword of Knight, Sword of Rook, then Sword of Queen.

<color=#297DE0>Traces: </color>Grants Traces when casting this skill.

1032202.name: Gambit
1032202.simpleDesc:
Brings the greatsword down upon the target, dealing Light DMG. Skill cast also grants the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Mark</material> corresponding to the type of greatsword used and places the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> on the battlefield. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103201)>King</material> is on the field, tap to cast the skill again, with Trace expended in the process to launch a specific attack depending on the greatsword type in question.
Sword of Knight: The greatsword falls again, dealing Light DMG.
Sword of Rook: Teleports to the greatsword's location and uses it to attack the target once, dealing Light DMG.
Sword of Queen: Launches the greatsword at the target, dealing Light DMG.

1032203.name: Pincer Attack
1032203.simpleDesc: Brandishes the greatsword and launches a forward attack, expending all active <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Marks</material> in the process and dealing Light DMG. Skill cast inflicts Shackle on the enemy. Deals additional DMG when cleaving down on the enemy from above. (The quantum of the additional DMG is based on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103202)>King Marks</material> expended.) Shackle is removed from the enemy upon hit.

1032209.name: Endgame
1032209.simpleDesc:
Summons multiple greatswords to attack the enemy, dealing Light DMG. Increases the Ultimate Skill DMG of all teammates upon skill cast.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod's Modifying Level reaches Ω.

1033101.name: Skyrender Ray
1033101.simpleDesc:
Continuously fires rays at enemies ahead using the Circles of Reason, dealing Light DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Grants Energy intermittently.

1033305.name: Leapfrog Advance
1033305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Restores Energy intermittently and increases additional ATK. The effect is shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>.

1033201.name: Within Reason
1033201.simpleDesc: Summons the Circles of Reason next to the enemy and punishes anyone who disrupts the order, dealing Light DMG.

1033202.name: Final Warning
1033202.simpleDesc: Summons the spinning Wheel of Admonishment above the enemy, dealing Light DMG. Increases DMG when the last strike of Final Warning hits. This effect is shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>.

1033203.name: Lightrealm Ultimate
1033203.simpleDesc: Activates the Circles of Reason to attack the enemy from above, dealing Light DMG. Generates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> upon skill hit, and all bonuses from the Mod's skills, Aether Codes, and the Dodge effect are shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>.

1033231.name: Gensrealm Ultimate
1033231.simpleDesc: Activates the Circles of Reason to attack the enemy from above, dealing Light DMG. Generates an enhanced <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material> upon skill hit, and all bonuses from the Mod's skills, Aether Codes, and the Dodge effect are shared with teammates who were within the recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>, whose skill damage is increased periodically.

1033209.name: Truth Mantras
1033209.simpleDesc:
Chants mantras of truth to unleash the potential within, increasing Mod's ATK. Deals extra DMG by the percentage of additional ATK upon landing a hit. This effect is shared with teammates who were within the most recently generated <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(103301)>Realm of Truth</material>.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers the Dodge effect.

1199101.name: Thundercall Blade
1199101.simpleDesc:
Slashes at the enemy using Katana continuously, dealing Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1199201.name: Thunder: Ardent Light
1199201.simpleDesc: Dashes forward and slashes at the enemy along the way, dealing Thunder DMG and inflicting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> on enemies hit.

1199202.name: Thunder: Dual Flow
1199202.simpleDesc: Uses double katanas to slash at the enemy in front, dealing Thunder DMG and inflicting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> on enemies hit.

1199203.name: Thunder: Out of the Blue
1199203.simpleDesc:
Uses Battoujutsu to slash at the enemies in front, clearing the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> from enemies that have the seal and enabling the next move of Thunder: Out of the Blue. There are a total of three moves in Thunder: Out of the Blue, and when the third move is used, Rage is not expended, and neither is the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> cleared from the enemy.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move I: Hands up and slashed, dealing Thunder DMG.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move II: Continues the slash, dealing Thunder DMG.
Thunder: Out of the Blue Move III: Unleashes four lightning strikes, dealing Thunder DMG. The second and subsequent strikes that hit the same enemy deal progressively less DMG.

1199209.name: Thunder: Thunderclap
1199209.simpleDesc:
Makes a dash for the locked-on enemy while slashing at them, dealing Thunder DMG. Increases Thunder DMG of all teammates upon skill cast.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1199305.name: Thunder: Lightning Dodge
1199305.simpleDesc:
Unleashes a skill attack by tapping on the Normal Attack button after Extremity Dodge is triggered, dealing Thunder DMG.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. The skill attack launched by tapping on the Normal Attack button inflicts the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119901)>Seal of Thunder</material> on enemies hit.

1138101.name: White Flash
1138101.simpleDesc:
Fires a beam of light at the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy:</color> Gains Energy periodically.

1138201.name: Falling Stars
1138201.simpleDesc: Summons 7 meteors above the locked-on enemy and attacks enemies within range, dealing Light DMG.

1138202.name: Dawn Wish
1138202.simpleDesc: Launches an attack on surrounding enemies, dealing Light DMG. And increases the ATK of the team member with the highest ATK.

1138203.name: Great Bear's Fury
1138203.simpleDesc: Summons the Big Dipper above the target to attack all enemies within range, dealing Light DMG.

1138209.name: Echo Chamber
1138209.simpleDesc:
Increases the DMG dealt by all teammates, and restores all Combat Resources expended by them in the next move within certain time.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a Teammate triggers Zero Time.

1138305.name: Phantasmal Lightdance
1138305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Triggers a solar arrow attack on the attacker, dealing Light DMG.

1138351.name: Feathers Fantastical
1138351.simpleDesc:
Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. Hold down on Dodge to trigger the Dodge effect again at the cost of Energy.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Triggers a solar arrow attack on the locked-on enemy, dealing Light DMG.

1111101.name: Scythe Slash
1111101.simpleDesc:
Summons scythe to slash the target continuously, dealing Wind DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>: Unleashes sword wings to mow down the target, dealing Wind DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace when the third or fifth attack hits. And also gains Trace when the fourth attack hits while in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>.

1111305.name: Bad Omens
1111305.simpleDesc:
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>, triggering Dodge also unleashes an attack on the enemies nearby, dealing Wind DMG.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Inflicts Weak on enemies hit by Dodge attack.

1111201.name: Darkwing Scythe
1111201.simpleDesc:
Throws the scythe, dealing Wind DMG to the locked-on enemy.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>: Fires sword wings at the target, dealing Wind DMG.
After Darkwing Scythe is cast, Traces can be expended to unleash it once again without granting any more Traces. Can be used once every CD.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Traces on every skill hit.

1111202.name: Spin of Death
1111202.simpleDesc:
Attacks surrounding enemies with the scythe, dealing Wind DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>: Summons sword wings around to attack enemies in their way, dealing Wind DMG.

1111203.name: Soul Death
1111203.simpleDesc:
Slashes the scythe upwards at the target, dealing Wind DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>: Gathers the enemy in front, dealing Wind DMG.

1111209.name: Hell to Pay
1111209.simpleDesc:
Escapes the ghostly shackles momentarily and enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material> with the HP restored to full and DMG of all teammates increased. Effect lasts until the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material> ends.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>: Changes the way the attack takes place with Scythe Slash, Darkwing Scythe, Spin of Death, and Soul Death. Gains a Super Armor but loses HP. When HP falls to 0, exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material> and returns to the original state. After exiting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>, the Mod gains an Ultimate Skill charge equal to that of the Mod with whom she has a preset Ultimate Skillchain. When no such Mod exists, the Mod can also be granted an Ultimate Skill charge when exiting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>.
Grants Ultimate Skill charge to the Mod and the Mod with whom she has a preset Ultimate Skillchain when entering the battlefield.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when an enemy is inflicted with Weak (Osiris must not be in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(111101)>Judge of the Underworld mode</material>).

1017101.name: Shadowy Claws
1017101.simpleDesc: Swipes the claws at the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG. Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state when the last strike of the normal attack hits.

1017201.name: Crescent Rush
1017201.simpleDesc:
Pounces forward and deals Shadow DMG. Skill casting grants the following additional effect when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state: Reduces the Shadow RES of locked-on enemies hit. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state expires immediately after this skill is cast.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace upon each skill hit.

1017202.name: Night Hunter
1017202.simpleDesc:
Leaps into the air and goes out of sight for a short time. Then, claws at the enemy upon reappearance, dealing Shadow DMG. Skill casting grants the following additional effect when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state: Inflicts Stun on the first enemy hit. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state expires immediately after this skill is cast.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace upon each skill hit.

1017203.name: Bastet's Caprice
1017203.simpleDesc:
Expends Trace to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state without interrupting the strike count of normal attacks. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state, Bastet's Caprice will become Goddess's Execution.
Goddess's Execution: Unleashes Shadow Divine Power to deal AoE Shadow DMG. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state expires immediately after this skill is cast.

1017209.name: Eye of Ra
1017209.simpleDesc:
Unleashes Shadow Divine Power to cast judgment on the enemy, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases Ultimate Skill DMG dealt to normal enemies based on the enemy's HP; Also increases Ultimate Skill DMG dealt to elite enemies and bosses based on the enemy's Mod Index.

Gains an Ultimate Skill charge when the enemy's Shadow RES is reduced.

1017305.name: Feline Shuffle
1017305.simpleDesc:
Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of normal attacks.
Dodge effect: Tap Normal Attack button shortly after triggering Extremity Dodge to teleport behind the locked-on enemy for another special skill attack, dealing Shadow DMG. Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101701)>Divine Gaze</material> state upon hitting an enemy.

1068101.name: Windrider
1068101.simpleDesc:
Attacks with the power of the wind, dealing Wind DMG. Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark with the last strike of a normal attack.

Passive:
When the Mod owns full <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Marks, all Marks will be expended upon skill casting and the skill will be enhanced.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when a normal attack hits.

1068201.name: Blast Squall
1068201.simpleDesc:
Condenses wind energy into a wind arrow, dealing 2 strikes of Wind DMG to the enemy. The second strike grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark.
Enhanced Blast Squall: Generates several wind arrows, each of which deals 2 strikes of Wind DMG. When a wind arrow generated by the Enhanced Blast Squall hits the eye of the storm created by Hurricane Spin, the wind arrow's second strike turns into an explosion, which deals Wind DMG.

1068202.name: Hurricane Spin
1068202.simpleDesc:
Attacks with the force of a hurricane, dealing Wind DMG. Skill casting also grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark. An eye of the storm forms when landing a hit.
Enhanced Hurricane Spin: Deals Wind DMG and generates several hurricanes, with each dealing Wind DMG. When a wind arrow generated by Blast Squall hits the eye of the storm created by the Enhanced Hurricane Spin, the wind arrow's second strike turns into a cyclone instead, dealing Wind DMG.

1068203.name: Stir in the Wind
1068203.simpleDesc:
This skill can be cast without expending Rage. Increases Skill DMG after casting and subsequently reduces the skill's remaining CD. Casting Blast Squall, Hurricane Spin while skill effects are active grants the following effects.
Hits landed with the wind arrows from Blast Squall reduce the enemy's Wind RES.
The eye of the storm generated by Hurricane Spin drags surrounding enemies.
When casting enhanced skills, the effects granted also enhance.
Enhanced Stir in the Wind: Turns into a hurricane and becomes Invincible. Skill casting is prohibited during this skill. Deals Wind DMG.

1068209.name: Tempest Burst
1068209.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG. Also increases all team members' Wind DMG dealt once cast.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time.

1068305.name: Zephyr Dodge
1068305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time. Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106801)>Windchime</material> Mark.

1070101.name: Penglai Swordplay
1070101.simpleDesc: Swings the Tenblaze continuously, and attacks the enemy multiple times with the resulting blaze blades to deal Fire DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark with every hit landed with the last strike of the attack.

1070201.name: Demon Slayer
1070201.simpleDesc:
Swings the Tenblaze and slashes continuously at the enemy, dealing Fire DMG. When the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, every hit landed with a slash attack expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107002)>Firefeather</material>, which increases the Mod's Skill DMG. When Mod has enough <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, skill cast will expend all the Marks and grant corresponding stacks of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107002)>Firefeather</material>, as well as deal additional Fire DMG.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, this skill is replaced by Crow's Scorch, which is then replaced by Demon Slayer when Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
Crow's Scorch: Brandishes the Tenblaze in the air to attack the enemy, expending <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks to deal Fire DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When Mod has enough <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, casting Demon Slayer will expend all the Marks and grant Divine Grace. Every hit landed with a Demon Slayer slash attack also expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks and grants Divine Grace. When Mod has enough <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, casting Crow's Scorch will expend all the Marks and grant Divine Grace. When Mod does not have enough <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, it will expend some of the Marks instead and grant less Divine Grace.

1070202.name: Evil Crusher
1070202.simpleDesc:
Unleashes blaze blades on the enemy multiple times to deal Fire DMG. Every hit landed on the enemy grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks. When Evil Crusher is in CD, it is replaced by Evil Incineration.
Evil Incineration: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks to unleash blaze blades on the enemy, dealing Fire DMG. Skill cast does not interrupt ongoing actions and every hit landed on the enemy grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, this skill is replaced by Crow's Fire, which is then replaced by Evil Crusher when Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
Crow's Fire: Expends all Divine Grace to generate a circle at the target location, inflicting Shackle on all enemies within the circle as well as reducing their Physical, Wind, and Fire RES in sequence based on the expended Divine Grace and then deals Fire DMG.

1070203.name: Sun Chaser
1070203.simpleDesc:
Expends all Divine Grace and deals Fire DMG to surrounding enemies, then jumps into the air to enter <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material>: Grants Unyielding effect. Increases Fire DMG based on the Divine Grace expended. Casting of skills or Dodge during this time will extend the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> until the end of casting, at which point the CD starts.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, this skill is replaced by Crow's Burn, and the form of the Penglai Swordplay attack changes. This skill is replaced by Sun Chaser when Mod exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
Penglai Swordplay: A skill attack unleashes blaze blades on the enemy, dealing Fire DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Mark based on the number of hits on the enemy.
Crow's Burn: Swoops down on the locked-on enemy and expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks, dealing Fire DMG. Increases this skill's Base DMG based on the expended <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks. Exits <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state after casting.

1070209.name: Tenblaze Incandescent
1070209.simpleDesc:
May be cast only when Mod is not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state. Unleashes the Mod's power, dealing Fire DMG. The Mod grants Divine Grace based on the amount of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107001)>Blazefire</material> Marks owned.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate casts the Ultimate Skill.

1070305.name: Sun Outage
1070305.simpleDesc:
Dodge effect: Triggers skill attack once in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107003)>Sunfade</material> state, tap Dodge to move quickly in the air and unleash blaze blades, dealing Fire DMG.

1067101.name: Ebb and Blow
1067101.simpleDesc:
Brandishes sword to control the flow of water, dealing Water DMG. Triggers a Riptide when the third strike of the normal attack hits.
Riptide: The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> on the field dashes toward the locked-on enemy, dealing Water DMG, and resets the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material>.

Passive:
Creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> by casting Rushing River or Ocean Blur.

1067201.name: Rushing River
1067201.simpleDesc:
Dashes at the target, dealing Water DMG to the enemy. Creates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> and triggers Tributary Flow upon landing a hit. At the end of skill casting, all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> on the field deal Water DMG to their surroundings. Refreshes the duration of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material>, and triggers Tributary Flow again.
Tributary Flow: Deals Water DMG to surrounding enemies when a Tributary Ghost is created.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace upon each skill hit.

1067202.name: Tide Surge
1067202.simpleDesc: Disappears into the air and deals Water DMG to enemies to the front. Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> on the field when the Mod owns <color=#E78300>2</color> or more Traces. Increases Melee DMG dealt by the Mod based on the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> expended. Then, recreates the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> expended around the locked-on enemy while dealing Water DMG to surrounding enemies.

1067203.name: Great Confluence
1067203.simpleDesc: Absorbs the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> that are within certain range around the Mod. Increases Skill DMG dealt by the Mod based on the ghosts absorbed. Also expends all Traces present. Increases Ghost's DMG dealt based on the Traces expended. Then, the Mod deals Water DMG to the enemy. A temporary Ghost is also generated for a short time for each <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material> absorbed, which deals Water DMG to the enemy.

1067209.name: Boundless Seas
1067209.simpleDesc:
Generates a flowblade and slashes with it, dealing Water DMG over a large area. Increases all team members' Water DMG and Melee DMG based on the amount of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghosts</material> present on the battlefield.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Extremity Dodge.

1067305.name: Ocean Blur
1067305.simpleDesc:
Generates <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106701)>Tributary Ghost</material>, triggers Tributary Flow and grants Trace when Extremity Dodge is triggered. When Mod owns Traces, launching a normal attack within a certain period of time of triggering Extremity Dodge expends Trace and deals Water DMG to the enemy while resetting the duration of the bonus effects from Great Confluence.
Dodge effect: Increases the Mod's Armor Pierce.

1016101.name: Rend Asunder
1016101.simpleDesc:
Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to launch a series of attacks, dealing Physical DMG. Hold down the Normal Attack button at the fifth strike of normal attack to unleash Explosive Slash that deals Physical DMG. Landing a hit in this way will cause an explosion, dealing Physical DMG. Also, active <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> Marks can cause additional explosions by expending Divine Grace. Explosive Slash does not interrupt the strike count of the normal attack.
Spinning Slash: Expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tanks</material> and launches a spinning slash attack, dealing Physical DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Burst-thresholds</material> and Divine Grace based on the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Pressure Tanks</material> expended. Each stack of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Burst-threshold</material> increases DMG dealt by the Mod. Casting Assault Tactic or Siege Tactic shortly after casting Spinning Slash also triggers Chainsaw Mode for said skill directly.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material>: Enhances normal attacks. Divine Grace is not granted during this mode, and every hit landed with the first five strikes expends Divine Grace, dealing additional Physical DMG. Exits this mode when Divine Grace runs out.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when the normal attack hits.

1016201.name: Assault Tactic
1016201.simpleDesc:
Greatsword Mode: Crushes sideways with the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG. Gains Super Armor for a short period of time while crushing the enemy. Switches to Chainsaw Mode upon hitting.
Chainsaw Mode: Stabs the enemy with the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG. Upon landing a skill hit, hold down the skill button to attack continuously expending Divine Grace, and get <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tanks</material> based on the amount of Divine Grace expended, increasing DMG dealt and dealing additional Physical DMG. Also increases skill damage when in Modified Mode. Switches back to Greatsword Mode after casting.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When attacked by the enemy in Super Armor state granted by this skill, enemy damage will be blocked and a great amount of Divine Grace will be granted.

1016202.name: Elimination Tactic
1016202.simpleDesc: Slashes the Wasteland Fiend both horizontally and vertically at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Gains a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tank</material> when the same enemy is hit with both horizontal and vertical slashes. Hold down to expend Divine Grace and continue slashing at the enemy horizontally and vertically, dealing additional Physical DMG, and get <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tanks</material> for every certain amount of Divine Grace expended.

1016203.name: Siege Tactic
1016203.simpleDesc:
Greatsword Mode: Brandishes the Wasteland Fiend to unleash a series of slashes, dealing Physical DMG. Switches to Chainsaw Mode upon hitting an enemy.
Chainsaw Mode: Inserts the Wasteland Fiend into the ground to emanate shockwaves that deal AoE Physical DMG. Hold down the skill button to expend Divine Grace to continue the casting. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Pressure Tanks</material> based on the amount of Divine Grace expended, increasing DMG dealt and dealing additional Physical DMG. Also increases skill damage when in Modified Mode. Switches back to Greatsword Mode after skill casting.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when landing a hit in Greatsword Mode.

1016209.name: Final Overclock
1016209.simpleDesc:
Overdrives the Wasteland Fiend, dealing Physical DMG. Inflicts Armor Break on enemies hit. Triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101603)>Chainsaw Overdrive Mode</material> after skill casting and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101601)>Burst-thresholds</material> equal to the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101602)>Pressure Tank</material> cap.

Gains an Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Extremity Dodge.

1016305.name: Crushing Spin
1016305.simpleDesc:
Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of the normal attack. In Assault Tactic and Siege Tactic's Chainsaw Mode, trigger a non-mobile Dodge to interrupt the skill, then quickly follow up with a normal attack to cast Spinning Slash.
Dodge effect: Gains Divine Grace upon entering Zero Time.

1024101.name: Jackal Rush
1024101.simpleDesc:
Launches a series of attacks, dealing Shadow DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material>: Launches a joint attack that deals Shadow DMG.

Passive:
The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> automatically attacks the enemy locked on by it using either a joint normal attack or a joint skill attack until the enemy is defeated. If the Mod's target differs from the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material>, when a Mod's skill hits, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will shift its focus to the Mod's locked-on enemy. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> may last on the field until the enemy locked on by it is defeated.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage when the normal attack hits.

1024305.name: Spirit Shuttle
1024305.simpleDesc:
Follow up with a normal attack shortly after triggering Extremity Dodge to launch a skill attack that deals Shadow DMG to the enemy, and the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack using Jackal Whirl on the Mod's locked-on enemy.
Dodge effect: Grants Rage.

1024201.name: Jackal Charge
1024201.simpleDesc: Focus the Divine Power to launch a ranged attack on the target, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases the Mod's Crit Rate upon hitting an enemy. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is on the field, skill cast also deals additional Shadow DMG, and hitting an enemy will change Spirit Guide to Jackal's Gaze; The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the target locked on by the Mod.

1024202.name: Jackal Whirl
1024202.simpleDesc: Focus the Divine Power to launch a crescent slash attack on the target, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases the Mod's Shadow DMG upon hitting an enemy. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is on the field, skill cast also deals additional Shadow DMG, and hitting an enemy will change Spirit Guide to Jackal's Wild Slash; the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the target locked on by the Mod.

1024203.name: Spirit Guide
1024203.simpleDesc:
Summons the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> to attack the Mod's locked-on target if the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is not yet present on the field, dealing Shadow DMG. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is already on the field, the skill will be replaced with Jackal's Gaze instead.
Jackal's Gaze: Deals Shadow DMG. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the enemy locked on by the Mod and then follow up with a ray attack upon skill hit, dealing Shadow DMG.
Jackal's Wild Slash: Deals Shadow DMG. The <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will immediately launch a joint attack on the enemy locked on by the Mod and then follow up with another claw attack upon skill hit, dealing Shadow DMG.
When the Mod casts Spirit Guide, Jackal's Gaze, or Jackal's Wild Slash, the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> will take on the Mod's current stats.

1024209.name: Afterlife Judgment
1024209.simpleDesc:
May be cast only when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> is on the field. The Mod becomes one with the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> and deals Shadow DMG. Upon skill casting, increases all team members' ATK and resets the Mod's skill CD.
When the Mod and the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> are in one, Skill 3 will be replaced with Jackal's Wild Slash instead. Each time a normal attack is launched or a skill is cast, an additional attack will be triggered, dealing Ultimate Skill damage.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when a teammate or the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit</material> defeats an enemy or when the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102401)>Jackal Spirit's</material> Joint Attack hits.

1074305.name: Windswept Patrol
1074305.simpleDesc:
Dodge Effect: When triggered by a non-mobile Dodge, the next time you tap on Normal Attack, Windrider will be launched. When triggered by a mobile Dodge, the next time you tap on Normal Attack, Skypatrol will be launched.
Windrider and Skypatrol both deal Wind DMG.

1074101.name: Art of Staff
1074101.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG.

Passive:
When Divine Grace is sufficient: After a non-mobile Dodge, the next non-derivative skill cast will be enhanced. After a Mobile Dodge, the skill cast prior to that will be replaced by its corresponding derivative skill. Casting a derivative skill or enhanced skill expends Divine Grace.
Enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state when casting the skill with full Divine Grace.
During <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107401)>Ascendancy</material> state: Shortens the CDs of Skill 1, 2 and 3. Grants Unyielding. Increases ATK. Reduces damage taken. Reduces Divine Grace gain rate.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace when the normal attack hits.

1074201.name: Cloud Break
1074201.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG.
Enhanced Skill: Gains Super Armor during skill cast, and gains Divine Grace upon each hit.
Derivative Skill "Cloudstep": Deals Wind DMG.

1074202.name: Seething Sea
1074202.simpleDesc:
Tap and hold to charge the skill. While charging, gains Super Armor and takes less damage. The skill unleashes automatically once fully charged, dealing Wind DMG.
Enhanced Skill: While casting, gains Super Armor and directly reaches full charge.
Derivative Skill "Flowfuse": Deals Wind DMG.

1074203.name: Wings of Might
1074203.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG.
Enhanced Skill: Gains Super Armor during skill cast, and gains Dodge Energy upon each hit.
Derivative Skill "Wingslap": Deals Wind DMG.

1074209.name: Deity Unveiled
1074209.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate casts an Ultimate Skill.

1132101.name: Blazing Strike
1132101.simpleDesc:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword stance</material>: Slashes powerfully at the enemy using the longsword, dealing Fire DMG.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor stance</material>: Launches a series of strikes at the enemy using the gauntlet, dealing Fire DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

1132201.name: Flaring Assault
1132201.simpleDesc:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword stance</material>: Slashes at the enemy ahead using the longsword, dealing Fire DMG and inflicting Stun on enemies hit.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor stance</material>: Expends Rage to charge ahead and attack the enemies using the gauntlet, dealing Fire DMG. Also, lowers the Fire RES of enemies hit.

1132202.name: Pyro Predator
1132202.simpleDesc:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword stance</material>: Sweeps the longsword to attack the enemies in a large area, dealing Fire DMG.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor stance</material>: Expends Rage to move the spinning sword to the locked-on enemy's position and reset the spinning sword's duration. This also increases DMG dealt by the sword.

1132203.name: Trial of Heat
1132203.simpleDesc:
Tosses the spinning longsword to the target position. The Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113202)>Blazing Armor stance</material>, and when a hit is landed on the first enemy, the spinning sword stops traveling, hovers, and deals AoE Fire DMG continuously. When this time is up, the sword vanishes, the Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword stance</material>, and this skill goes into CD.
Tap the skill again while the sword is spinning at the target location to summon it back. Once the returning sword is caught, the Mod switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword stance</material>, and the longsword and gauntlet come together for a powerful attack that deals Fire DMG. Mod has Control Immunity and DMG Immunity during this attack, and the skill goes into CD thereafter.

1132209.name: Hellfire Rekindled
1132209.simpleDesc:
Recalls the longsword and switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(113201)>Burning Sword stance</material>. Then, coalesces the flames using Divine Power and unleashes a mighty slash attack within a large area, dealing Fire DMG. When a hit is landed, all teammates gain a Skill DMG boost and an Ultimate Skill DMG boost.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate casts an Ultimate Skill.

1132305.name: Darkfire
1132305.simpleDesc: Dodge effect: Grants Rage. Increases Fire DMG.

1075101.name: Southern Fire
1075101.simpleDesc:
Lingguang mastered an esoteric fire skill following deep study of the stars.
Deals Fire DMG. Follow up with a normal attack after using any skill in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode to start the normal attack from the fourth strike. When casting Undying Flames: Start or Rising Splendor: Start, tap Normal Attack to interrupt the skill and follow up with the fourth strike of a normal attack.

Passive:
When a hit is landed with the fourth or fifth strike of a normal attack, or when Hexagram Auspicious: Start or Hexagram Auspicious: Ignite lands a hit, Undying Flames and Rising Splendor will switch between <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.
Cast skill again within a certain period of the previous skill cast for continuous casting. Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107509)>Afire</material> state after continuously casting 4 skills.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107509)>Afire</material>: During this state, all skills switch to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode, with only one of them available for casting. All skills switch to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start mode</material> when Mod exits the state.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants 1 Trace when an enemy hit is landed with the fifth strike of a normal attack.

1075201.name: Undying Flames
1075201.simpleDesc:
This skill has three modes in battle.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode: Dashes at the enemy and attacks them with the folding fans, dealing Fire DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode: Makes a sudden dash and attacks enemies along the way, dealing Fire DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode: Expends Traces, dealing Fire DMG to surrounding enemies. Skill cast grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107504)>Shining Armor</material>: Grants a shield of value equal to a certain percentage of Untainted Heart - Lingguang's Max HP to all team members.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Trace when a hit is landed in either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.

1075202.name: Rising Splendor
1075202.simpleDesc:
This skill has three modes in battle.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode: Attacks the enemy ahead with the folding fans, dealing Fire DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode: Takes a leap to the back, leaving behind spinning fans that attack the enemy, dealing Fire DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode: Expends, dealing Fire DMG to surrounding enemies. Skill cast grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107505)>Burning Ember</material>: When HP is lower than a certain value, the lower the HP, the higher the Non-DoT DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Trace when a hit is landed in either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.

1075203.name: Hexagram Auspicious
1075203.simpleDesc:
This skill has three modes in battle.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode: Swings the folding fans while lunging to attacks enemies in a large area ahead, dealing Fire DMG. Skill switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode upon enemy hit.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode: Cross-swings the folding fans to strike at enemies in a large area ahead, dealing Fire DMG. Skill switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode upon enemy hit.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode: Expends Traces, dealing Fire DMG to surrounding enemies. Skill cast grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107506)>Fire Brilliant</material>: When HP is higher than a certain value, the higher the HP, the higher the Non-DoT DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Grants Trace when a hit is landed in either <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107501)>Start</material> mode or <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107502)>Ignite</material> mode.

1075209.name: Vermilion Starlight
1075209.simpleDesc:
Grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material> when any skill is cast in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107503)>Aflame</material> mode. Also grants all team members <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material> when Mod's Ultimate Skill is cast. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material> bonuses do not apply when the Mod also has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107507)>Burning Sun</material>: Increases the Independent Non-DoT DMG based on a certain probability.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107508)>Blazing Sun</material>: Increases the Independent Non-DoT DMG based on an even higher probability.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when Mod or a teammate crits.

1076101.name: Vastness Awash
1076101.simpleDesc:
Deals Water DMG. The fourth strike of a normal attack gathers enemies and levitates enemies hit, while the sixth strike inflicts Knockup on enemies hit.

Passive:
Casting Skill 1 or Skill 2 grants corresponding <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks. Up to <color=#E78300>4</color> of these Marks can be held at any time.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

1076201.name: Celestial Starfall
1076201.simpleDesc:
Yang: Deals Water DMG and levitates enemies hit. Skill cast grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks, and then switches to Yin.
Yin: Deals Water DMG and gathers enemies within a small range. Skill cast grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks, and then switches to Yang.
Yang and Yin share a CD.

1076202.name: Cloud Meld
1076202.simpleDesc:
Yang: Deals Water DMG and levitates enemies hit by the last attack. Skill cast grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks, and then switches to Yin.
Yin: Deals Water DMG. Skill cast grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks, and then switches to Yang.
Yang and Yin share a CD.

1076203.name: Antarctic Echo
1076203.simpleDesc:
Casting Antarctic Echo inflicts Sluggish to all enemies on the field.
Yang: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks, dealing Water DMG, then gathers enemies within a large range. After this skill is cast, Skill 1 and Skill 2 both switch to Yin mode with CD reset, and this skill switches to Yin as well. The Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107603)>Apex: Xu</material> state.
Yin: Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks, dealing Water DMG. Then, within a certain period of time, periodically selects random enemies <color=#E78300>4</color> times to attack, dealing Water DMG. After this skill is cast, Skill 1 and Skill 2 both switch to Yang mode with CD reset, and this skill switches to Yang as well. The Mod enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107604)>Apex: Heng</material> state.
Yang and Yin do not share a CD.

1076209.name: Question for the Heavens
1076209.simpleDesc:
Deals Water DMG.

When a Tian Yuan Mod lands a hit, they gain different amounts of Ultimate Skill charge depending on the number of Tian Yuan Mods deployed at the start of the battle.

1076305.name: Into the Abyss
1076305.simpleDesc: Dodge Effect: Enters Zero Time and gathers enemies within a small range. Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107601)>Yang</material> Marks when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107604)>Apex: Heng</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107602)>Yin</material> Marks when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107603)>Apex: Xu</material>.

1072101.name: Tian Lu Special
1072101.simpleDesc: Launches up to 5 strikes of attack at the enemy, dealing Wind DMG.

1072201.name: Breezy Blessings
1072201.simpleDesc: Swiftly glides forward and delivers a fierce blow, dealing Wind DMG.

1072202.name: Actus Abacus
1072202.simpleDesc: Throws the weapon to launch a whirling attack at the enemy, dealing Wind DMG.

1072203.name: Raining Wealth
1072203.simpleDesc:
Shortly after the final strike of Normal Attack, Skill 1, or Skill 2, this skill will be replaced by Evil Expeller and can be cast immediately as a follow-up attack of the attacks mentioned above, which will result in different number of strikes, different amounts of damage, and different <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> points obtained upon a hit.

When Traces are at max, consumes all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material>, then leaps into the air and attacks the enemy. Damage dealt is determined by the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> expended.
Casting Raining Wealth increases the Wind DMG of the entire team, and deals different amounts of Wind DMG depending on the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material> expended.

<color=#297DE0>Traces:</color> Gains Trace after the last strike of Evil Expeller hits.

1072209.name: Money Gobbler
1072209.simpleDesc:
Deals Wind DMG and creates a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material> that follows the Mod.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107202)>Lucky Coin</material>: Increases Non-DoT Wind DMG of the Mod it follows. When the Mod it follows lands a hit, the Lucky Coin will launch a joint attack and briefly gathers the enemies, dealing Wind DMG, and it also reduces the Wind RES of the enemies it hits.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers the Dodge effect.

1072305.name: Bad Luck Dodger
1072305.simpleDesc:
Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of normal attacks.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time and gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(107201)>Fortune</material>.

1049101.name: Curse of Ice
1049101.simpleDesc:
Slashes five times at the enemy, dealing Ice DMG.

Passive:
Generates an <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> that follows her after launching the third strike or casting Higan: Frostdance or Higan: Bonechill.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror:</material> Shatters after a brief delay. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shards hit the Mod, the skill attack: Broken Mirror: Dark is launched, dealing DMG to the enemy and granting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect to the Mod for a short time. If the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shards don't hit the Mod, the skill attack: Broken Mirror: Secret is launched, dealing DMG to the enemy.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk:</material> Gains Unyielding. Replaces Higan: Frostdance and Higan: Bonechill with their corresponding derivative skills. Casting the fifth strike will expend <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect and summon <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> for a skill attack on the enemy.
When the Mod triggers Extremity Dodge from dodging the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104901)>Ice Mirror</material> shards, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> will be summoned to attack the enemy.
Within a certain period of time after triggering Extremity Dodge, tap on the Normal Attack button to unleash a follow-up attack that deals extra DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

1049305.name: Higan: Dark Currents
1049305.simpleDesc: Dodge Effect: Zero Time; ATK boost.

1049201.name: Higan: Frostdance
1049201.simpleDesc:
Swiftly unleashes a slash at the enemy ahead, dealing Ice DMG.
Mirrorbloom: Frostdance (derivative): Grants Unyielding when this skill is cast. Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> and launches a dash-and-slash with her, expending Rage and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect, dealing Ice DMG.
Higan: Frostdance and Mirrorbloom: Frostdance share a CD.

1049202.name: Higan: Bonechill
1049202.simpleDesc:
Brandishes the cursed blade, performing a horizontal sweep then an upward flick, dealing Ice DMG.
Mirrorbloom: Bonechill (derivative): Grants Unyielding when this skill is cast. Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> and unleashes a spinning slash with her, expending Rage and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104902)>Mirrorwalk</material> effect. The Mod and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> deal Ice DMG respectively.
Higan: Bonechill and Mirrorbloom: Bonechill share a CD.

1049203.name: Higan: Chibiki
1049203.simpleDesc:
Summons Hisame and gathers divine ice power at the front. Hold down on the skill button to go into a parry stance, then release or wait until the time runs out to launch an Ice DMG attack. Then, the remaining CD of the skill is shortened.
When the Mod takes a hit in parry stance, she blocks the damage and inflicts Freeze on the attacker. Increases the Mod's ATK. Gains Rage. Unleashes a slash attack along with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> to deal Ice DMG.

1049209.name: Pathfinder of Yomi
1049209.simpleDesc:
Summons <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(104903)>Hisame</material> from the ice mirror, then unleashes divine ice power and slashes the enemy with her, dealing Ice DMG. When this skill is being cast, increases the Ice DMG dealt by all members of the team, and inflicts Freeze on the enemy at the front (Freeze will be removed upon hit).

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate crits.

1055305.name: Moonlit Step
1055305.simpleDesc:
Within a short time after any strike of Normal Attack, a regular Skill 3, Skill 1, or Skill 2 attack is launched, a Non-mobile Dodge can be triggered to unleash a So-ei Strike, unleashing frost energy condensed from Divine Power on the enemy. Doing so will result in various modes of So-ei Strike depending on what the preceding attack is.
Every hit landed with So-ei Strike inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> on the enemy. When an enemy in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> is hit with an Ice attack by any member of the team, increases Non-DoT Crit Rate.
Dodge effect:</color> Zero Time.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a So-ei Strike hits.

1055101.name: Naginata Slash
1055101.simpleDesc:
Brandishes the naginata to perform five slashes, dealing Ice DMG.

Passive:
Following up any strike of the Normal Attack with Frostbreaker or So-ei Strike within a short time will not interrupt the Normal Attack strike count.
