<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Gains Rage when a normal attack hits.

1055201.name: Shadowswayer
1055201.simpleDesc: Dashes forward twice while slashing with the naginata, dealing Ice DMG.

1055202.name: Moonshatter
1055202.simpleDesc: With Divine Power of ice condensed at the tip of her blade, triggers an explosion of ice crystals in the target area, dealing Ice DMG.

1055203.name: Frostbreaker
1055203.simpleDesc:
Swings the naginata and thrusts forward, dealing Ice DMG.
This skill can be cast following up any strike of Normal Attack, a regular Skill 3, Skill 1, or Skill 2 attack, which will result in various derivative modes of Frostbreaker.
The Ice RES of enemies hit by a follow-up Frostbreaker will be lowered.

1055209.name: Silver Petals
1055209.simpleDesc:
Slashes at the enemy with a large amount of Divine Power of ice condensed on the blade, dealing Ice DMG. Grants the Ice Mod on the team with the highest ATK the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105502)>Congeal:</material> Grants Super Armor, reduces DMG taken, and increases Crit DMG; also inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(105501)>Frost</material> on enemies hit.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge whenever the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time.

1061101.name: Zhuanxu Mystique
1061101.simpleDesc:
Zhiming devised this secret technique after studying the northern constellations and ancient divination, and incorporating these into Ethereal Enigma.
Deals Water DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstars</material> for each strike of Normal Attacks.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when launching Normal Attacks.

1061201.name: Dwindling Water
1061201.simpleDesc:
Magic derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique.
Deals Water DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> Mark and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points.

1061202.name: North Star's Mandate
1061202.simpleDesc:
Magic derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique.
Deals Water DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Mark and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points.

1061203.name: True Epiphany
1061203.simpleDesc:
Magic derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> and Marks are full, activates Calculation.
Calculation: Gains Super Armor during cast. Takes less DMG. Dwindling Water and North Star's Mandate are replaced with Calculation: Data Input. You can tap to cast Calculation: Data Input by expending Divine Grace. After tapping a total of 2 times to cast this skill by expending Divine Grace, according to the type and number of current Marks, all Marks and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points will be expended to launch different attacks. Also, increases Calculation's Non-DoT ATK based on the amount of Divine Grace expended.
Calculation: Equation: 2 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> Marks. Deals Water DMG. Gains Divine Grace.
Calculation: Induction: 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106103)>Black Tortoise</material> Mark and 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Mark. Deals Water DMG and inflicts Armor Break on hit enemies.
Calculation: Overload: 2 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106104)>Dark Serpent</material> Marks. Deals Water DMG.
When Calculation is cast 2 times in a row, this skill will be replaced with Calculation: Hyperorder.
Calculation: Hyperorder: During use, Zhuanxu Mystique, Dwindling Water, North Star's Mandate, and True Epiphany are replaced with Hyperorder Calculation: Data Input. The third time you spend Divine Grace and tap Hyperorder Calculation: Data Input, an attack will be launched, dealing Water DMG, and drawing enemies together over a large area. Also, the Non-DoT ATK of this last powered-up strike increases based on the amount of Divine Grace expended by tapping the skill during this state.

1061209.name: The Great Starfall
1061209.simpleDesc:
Converts Divine Power into energy and bombards the enemy, dealing Water DMG.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate crits.

1061305.name: Ethereal Step
1061305.simpleDesc:
A technique derived from the Zhuanxu Mystique.
Hold down Dodge to deploy a defensive shield and gain <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> points.
Quickly dodges the enemy's attacks. Extremity Dodge triggers the Dodge effect. If attacked when the shield is active, blocks damage and triggers the Dodge effect.
If you hold down Dodge button then release it when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> is full, or if Zhiming is hit while the shield is active, all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106102)>Southwave</material> will be removed to cast a Skill attack, dealing Water DMG, also gaining Divine Grace and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points.
Dodge effect: Zero Time; When the Dodge effect is triggered by blocking an attack, gains additional Divine Grace and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(106101)>Northstar</material> points.

1150101.name: Kata Sakura
1150101.simpleDesc:
Unleashes the ancient sword energy slumbering within Sakurakiri to deal Thunder DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains Divine Grace when Normal Attacks hit.

1150201.name: Kata 1: Crack
1150201.simpleDesc:
The first move of the ancient technique inherited from Sakurakiri. Deals Thunder DMG.
Kata 1: Halt: Can be used as a follow-up attack of successive strikes, dealing Thunder DMG. If the strikes are not all launched in a row, this skill's remaining CD is then shortened according to the number of strikes launched successively. When in possession of Divine Grace, gains the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark each time a strike hits.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains Divine Grace upon each hit.

1150202.name: Kata 3: Lightning
1150202.simpleDesc:
The third move of the ancient technique inherited from Sakurakiri. Deals Thunder DMG.
Kata 3: Dance: Can be used as a follow-up attack of successive strikes, dealing Thunder DMG. If the strikes are not all launched in a row, this skill's remaining CD is then shortened according to the number of strikes launched successively. When in possession of Divine Grace, gains the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark each time a strike hits.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains Divine Grace upon each hit.

1150203.name: Kata 9: Somezakura
1150203.simpleDesc:
Unleashes the full power of Sakurakiri. Only available when Divine Grace is full. Inflicts Sluggish on locked-on enemies, slowing their movement speed and dealing Thunder DMG. Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material>: Replaces Kata 1: Crack, Kata 3: Lightning, and Kata 9: Somezakura with Kata 1: Halt, Kata 3: Dance, and Kata 9: Fallen Sakura, and resets the skill CD. During this state, Divine Grace is expended automatically and its gain rate is reduced. Each time a Normal Attack or a Skill hits, gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossom</material> point.
Kata 9: Crimson Shadow: When the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks, tapping on Normal Attack button will expend the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Mark to rush forward, dealing Thunder DMG.
Kata 9: Fallen Sakura: Delivers a slashing attack with unparalleled speed, dealing Thunder DMG. Increases the skill's Non-DoT Independent DMG based on the number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossom</material>points expended. When the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material> expended have not yet reached the maximum number, inflicts Sluggish on locked-on enemies. When the maximum number of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material> are expended, enters Zero Time, and the Non-DoT Crit Rate of the final strike of this skill attack is increased. Then exits the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, all Divine Grace, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115003)>Blossom</material> Marks, and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115002)>Ominous Blossoms</material> are expended, and Kata 9: Somezakura goes into CD.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> When not in the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115001)>Sakuya</material> state, gains Divine Grace after Kata 2: Disillusion lands a hit.

1150209.name: Execution by Thousand Petals
1150209.simpleDesc:
Unleashes countless slashing attacks in an instant, dealing Thunder DMG. Upon hitting, increases the Crit Rate of the whole team.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when the Mod or a teammate triggers Zero Time.

1150305.name: Murky Step
1150305.simpleDesc:
Unleashes Kata 2: Disillusion by tapping on the Normal Attack button within a short while after Extremity Dodge is triggered, dealing Thunder DMG.
Dodge effect: Enters Zero Time.

1015101.name: Radiant Verdict
1015101.simpleDesc:
Swings the Sun Disc of Judgment at enemies, dealing Physical DMG

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace when Normal Attacks hit.

1015201.name: Lioness Pursuit
1015201.simpleDesc:
Launches a grappling hook at the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. After landing a hit, rushes at the enemy, gains Super Armor and the ability to block incoming DMG. Successfully blocking DMG during this period resets the CD of Tear & Devour. When fails to rush at the enemy, this skill's remaining CD is shortened.
Within a short time after Lioness Pursuit hits, Lioness Pursuit is replaced by Lioness Sawblade and Sawblade Rumble is replaced by Sawblade Dance. After any of these skills is cast, Skills 1 and 2 return to their original forms.
Lioness Sawblade: Leaps up and slams the Sun Disc of Judgment downward, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains or restores Divine Grace when Lioness Pursuit hits or when damage is successfully blocked while rushing at the enemy.

1015202.name: Sawblade Rumble
1015202.simpleDesc:
Slams the Sun Disc of Judgment to the ground, dealing DMG to the surrounding area then falling back, dealing Physical DMG. Gains Unyielding during cast.
Sawblade Dance: Swings the sawblade in a circle, dealing Physical DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Gains Divine Grace every time Sawblade Rumble hits.

1015203.name: Tear & Devour
1015203.simpleDesc:
Lacerates enemies with the Sun Disc of Judgment, dealing Physical DMG. Gains Unyielding during cast and automatically expends Divine Grace to continuously attack the enemy, dealing Physical DMG. Gains <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material>. Lowers the enemy's Physical RES upon landing a hit.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material> reaches certain amount, holding Normal Attack will expend <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101501)>Sunglint</material> to unleash the Foe Shredder skill.
Foe Shredder: Slams the Sun Disc of Judgment down and launches 3 sawtooth waves made of Divine Grace, dealing Physical DMG.

1015209.name: Power of Civilization
1015209.simpleDesc:
Unleashes her power within and grants the whole team with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material>, restoring HP to the whole team.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(101502)>Potential Unleashed</material>: Increases Physical DMG.

Gains Ultimate Skill charge when enemies are inflicted with Armor Break.

1095101.name: String Sever
1095101.simpleDesc:
Deals Physical DMG.

Passive:
Skill use does not interrupt normal attacks.
Unleashing the final strike of a normal attack when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state replaces Dance on edge and Silverdrop with Spin on edge and Shadowcut respectively, and the CDs of Spin on edge and Shadowcut are reset. Use of any skill after reverts Spin on edge and Shadowcut to Dance on edge and Silverdrop respectively.
Unleashing the final strike of a normal attack when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state replaces Spin on edge and Shadowcut with The Stitch: Edge and The Stitch: Thread respectively, and use of any skill after reverts The Stitch: Edge and The Stitch: Thread to Spin on edge and Shadowcut respectively.

<color=#297DE0>Energy: </color>Recovers Energy at a certain interval when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state.

1095201.name: Dance on edge
1095201.simpleDesc:
Deals Physical DMG.
Spin on edge: Deals Physical DMG.
Skill use grants the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> mark.
Use of Dance on edge or Spin on edge grants a short period of Dodge which does not trigger the Dodge effect. Use of Extremity Dodge to dodge the enemy's attack grants Energy.

1095202.name: Silverdrop
1095202.simpleDesc:
Deals Physical DMG.
Shadowcut: Deals Physical DMG.
Skill use grants the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> mark.
Use of Silverdrop or Shadowcut slows the movements of enemies.

1095203.name: The Stitch
1095203.simpleDesc:
May only be used when there are marks to be expended. Attack form varies depending on the type and number of various marks expended.
The Stitch: Edge: Expending 2 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> marks deals Physical DMG;
The Stitch: Cut: Expending 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109502)>Featherblade</material> and 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> mark deals Physical DMG as well as slows the movements of enemies;
The Stitch: Thread: Expending 2 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109503)>Silverthread</material> marks deals Physical DMG as well as slows the movements of enemies that are hit.
When the Energy bar is full, hold down on the normal attack button to unleash Featherfall.
Featherfall: Expends all marks and deals Physical DMG to all surrounding enemies, then goes into <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state. The CDs of Spin on edge and Shadowcut are also reset. During skill action, ATK increases, the amount of which depends on the max Energy level, until the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state ends. When marks are expended due to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material>, restores expended marks when the state ends.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material>: Loses Energy at a given interval. When in said state, Dance on edge, Silverdrop, and The Stitch are replaced by Spin on edge, Shadowcut, and The Snare respectively. Use of Spin on edge and Shadowcut does not grant the corresponding marks.
The Snare: Deals Physical DMG as well as slows the movements of enemies within range.

1095209.name: Moonless Night
1095209.simpleDesc:
Deals Physical DMG. Skill use increases Independent DMG dealt and all Attribute DMG dealt by all members of the team.

Grants an Ultimate Skill charge when any member of the team lands a critical hit.

1095305.name: Shade Spin
1095305.simpleDesc:
Dodge will not interrupt the strike count of normal attacks.
Dodge effect: Tapping on the normal attack button within a given time after an Extremity Dodge unleashes an Invisible String skill attack. When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state, Dance on edge and Silverdrop are replaced by Spin on edge and Shadowcut respectively and the CDs of Spin on edge and Shadowcut are reset. When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(109501)>Weaver</material> state, Spin on edge and Shadowcut are replaced by The Stitch: Edge and The Stitch: Thread respectively.
Invisible String: Teleports right behind the enemy, dealing Physical DMG and slowing the movements of the locked-on enemy.

1284101.name: Edge of Time
1284101.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG. Normal attacks launched when not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>「Daybreak</material> upon each hit.

Passive:
The first, third, and fifth strikes of a normal attack launched when in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state launches a Hand of Judgment attack that deals Light DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace each time a hit is landed with a normal attack.

1284201.name: Flash of Brilliance
1284201.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG. During skill action, this skill is replaced by Flash, and if Flash is not unleashed within a short period of time it will be replaced by Brilliance in turn.
Flash: Deals Light DMG.
Brilliance: Deals Light DMG and expends all available Divine Grace, which increases skill non-DoT DMG for every point of Divine Grace expended.
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state, hits landed with Flash of Brilliance, Flash, and Brilliance grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace upon every hit landed with Flash of Brilliance or Flash.

1284202.name: Ripple of Fate
1284202.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG. During skill action, this skill is replaced by Destiny, and if Destiny is not unleashed within a short period of time it will be replaced by Choice in turn.
Destiny: Deals Light DMG.
Choice: Deals Light DMG and expends all available Divine Grace, which increases skill non-DoT DMG for every point of Divine Grace expended.
When not in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state, hits landed with Ripple of Fate, Destiny, and Choice grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace: </color>Grants Divine Grace upon every hit landed with Ripple of Fate or Destiny.

1284203.name: Slash of Conviction
1284203.simpleDesc:
May only be used when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material> is at max. Deals Light DMG and enters <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material> state, and also resets the CDs of Flash of Brilliance and Ripple of Fate.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128402)>Decision</material>: Automatically expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(128401)>Daybreak</material>. Use of Flash, Brilliance, Destiny or Choice when in this state triggers a new Hand of Judgment attack which deals Light DMG.
When using Brilliance or Choice, Slash of Conviction is replaced by Slash of Glare, which may then be followed up with Slash of Glare to deal Light DMG.

1284209.name: Resolve of the Moment
1284209.simpleDesc:
Deals Light DMG. Hits landed on the enemy increase the Light DMG dealt by all members of the team as well as increase the Mod Index Multiplier for the current Ultimate Skill attack.

Grants an Ultimate Skill charge when any member of the team triggers Zero Time.

1284305.name: Fleeting Shadow
1284305.simpleDesc:
Raises sword to block during a non-mobile dodge. Tap the normal attack button after a successful block to counterattack for Light DMG. Every time hits are landed with a counterattack, the CDs of Flash of Brilliance and Ripple of Fate are shortened, and every hit landed with a counterattack grants Divine Grace. Hits landed with a counterattack when the Dodge effect is not in CD also triggers said effect.
Dodge effect: Zero Time.

1197101.name: Dream Glimmer
1197101.simpleDesc:
Deals Shadow DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Energy: </color>Recovers Energy at a certain interval.

1197201.name: Eternal Slumber
1197201.simpleDesc:
Deals Shadow DMG. Skill is also replaced by its derivative skill Deep Dream.
Deep Dream: Expends Energy and deals Shadow DMG, as well as additional Shadow DMG based on current Energy level.
Each use of this skill or its derivative skill grants 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmare</material>.

1197202.name: Distant Day Dream
1197202.simpleDesc:
Deals Shadow DMG. Skill is also replaced by its derivative skill Day Dream.
Day Dream: Expends Energy and deals Shadow DMG. ATK is boosted by on current <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material> count.
Each use of this skill or its derivative skill grants 1 <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material>.

1197203.name: Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn
1197203.simpleDesc:
Tap to trigger this skill to deal Shadow DMG. Also expends all <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> available, then <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dreams</material>. Effects vary depending on the number of Nightmares and Sweet Dreams expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmare</material>: Expending Nightmares grants Energy depending on the number of Nightmares expended.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material>: Expending Sweet Dreams grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmares</material> which in turn provide a certain number of ATK boosts accordingly.

1197209.name: False Dream from Gates of Ivory
1197209.simpleDesc:
Triggers or refreshes the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material>: Increases the Shadow DMG dealt by all members of the team. Expending Energy equal to max Energy when the Energy bar is full grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material>. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material> ends when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state is triggered or refreshed.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119704)>Dreamful Slumber</material>: Hits landed with a Shadow attack by any member of the team reduce the Shadow RES of the hit enemy and deal extra Shadow DMG.
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state, Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn is replaced by Moment of Waking, and Lucid Dream from Gates of Horn is automatically triggered at a certain interval.
Moment of Waking: Triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material>, ends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material> state, and deals Shadow DMG.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119705)>Roused</material>: Deals additional Shadow DMG to the locked-on target for every Shadow attack landed by any member of the team during the current instance of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119703)>Ethereal Dream</material>.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge when any member of the team uses their Ultimate Skill.

1197305.name: Fleeting Dream
1197305.simpleDesc: Dodge Effect: Grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119701)>Nightmare</material> and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(119702)>Sweet Dream</material> when in Zero Time.

1022101.name: Aria of the Moon
1022101.simpleDesc:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG. On the third strike of the normal attack, the skill will change to the corresponding <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Sonata</material>. Outside of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102205)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state, the normal attack's fifth strike grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> points.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG. On the fifth strike of the normal attack, the skill will change to the corresponding <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102205)>Sonata</material>.

Passive: 
When a skill is changed to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102206)>Elegy</material>, other skills can't be changed to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102205)>Sonata</material>.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Normal attacks grant Divine Grace when they hit.

1022201.name: New Moon's Shadow
1022201.simpleDesc:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
New Moon's Shadow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG.
New Moon's Shadow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG. Creates a field that inflicts Sluggish on enemies within range. Also replaces this skill with New Moon's Shadow: Elegy for a short time.
New Moon's Shadow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to detonate the field, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases this skill's Base DMG based on Divine Grace expended.
Hitting an enemy with this skill grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>. If the amount of Divine Grace expended is no less than a certain amount, grants additional <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> points.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG.
Full Moon's Shadow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG and generates an orb that continuously gathers enemies and deals Shadow DMG. Also replaces this skill with Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy for a period of time.
Full Moon's Shadow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to detonate the orb, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases this skill's Base DMG based on Divine Grace expended.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace</color>: New Moon's Shadow: Harmony and Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony grant Divine Grace when they hit.

1022202.name: New Moon Aglow
1022202.simpleDesc:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
New Moon Aglow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG.
New Moon Aglow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG and adds a Mark to the first enemy hit. Also replaces this skill with New Moon Aglow: Elegy for a short time.
New Moon Aglow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to teleport to the location of the marked enemy, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases this skill's Base DMG based on Divine Grace expended.
Hitting an enemy with this skill grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> points. If the amount of Divine Grace expended is no less than a certain amount, grants additional <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> points.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Full Moon Aglow: Harmony: Deals Shadow DMG.
Full Moon Aglow: Sonata: Deals Shadow DMG and generates an orb that continuously deals Shadow DMG. Also replaces this skill with Full Moon Aglow: Elegy for a period of time.
Full Moon Aglow: Elegy: Expends all Divine Grace to detonate the orb, dealing Shadow DMG. Increases this skill's Base DMG based on Divine Grace expended.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace</color>: New Moon Aglow: Harmony and Full Moon Aglow: Harmony grant Divine Grace each time they hit.

1022203.name: Lunar Cycle
1022203.simpleDesc:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
Only usable at max <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material>. Switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>, replacing New Moon's Shadow with Full Moon's Shadow: Harmony and New Moon Aglow with Full Moon Aglow: Harmony. Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material>: Increases ATK and Crit Rate. Reduces DMG taken and grants Super Armor.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> points at regular intervals.
When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> is exhausted, exits the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102207)>Veil Over The Full Moon</material> state.
Only usable when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102203)>Moonphase</material> is exhausted. Switches to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>, replacing Full Moon's Shadow with New Moon's Shadow: Harmony and Full Moon Aglow with New Moon Aglow: Harmony, and dealing Shadow DMG.

1022209.name: Moonlight Brilliant
1022209.simpleDesc:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102201)>New Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG and produces a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102208)>New Moon Splendor</material>: Continuously taunt normal and elite enemies within a certain range.

In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>:
Deals Shadow DMG and produces a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material>.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102209)>Full Moon Brilliant</material>: Adds <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material> to a certain number of enemies.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102210)>Lunar Eclipse</material>: When enemies receive DMG, applies DMG to others that are in this state.

When entering battle, restores a certain amount of Ultimate Skill charge to both you and Mods with your Ultimate Skillchain.

Grants Ultimate Skill charge after dealing Crit with an attack by yourself or a teammate.

1022305.name: Shadowlune
1022305.simpleDesc:
When in <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102202)>Full Moon</material>, dodging will not interrupt the successive strikes of your normal attack. Extremity Dodge grants Unyielding.
Dodge effect: Zero Time.

1021101.name: Sword Concerto
1021101.simpleDesc:
Deals Physical DMG.

In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state:
Expends <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> points at regular intervals while the state persists. Grants Unyielding and forbids the casting of any skills or Ultimate Skills.
Repeatedly tap normal attack to execute five strikes, dealing Physical DMG. On the fifth strike, expends all Rage to increase the fifth strike's Non-DoT ATK based on Rage expended.
If the Mod has <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material>, long press normal attack after the fourth strike to deal a special normal attack. Continue holding or repeatedly tap normal attack while the special attack is underway to deal Physical DMG. Follow up with another normal attack to continue from the normal attack's fifth strike.
If the Mod's <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> has been exhausted, long press normal attack to expend all Rage and exit the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, dealing Physical DMG, while also inflicting Sluggish on the locked-on enemy.

Passive:
The Mod doesn't automatically gain Ultimate Skill charge. Rather, Ultimate Skill charge is restored to max when <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> is full.
Casting Daybreak Quartet and Sunrise Rhapsody grants Unyielding.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Normal attack hits grant Rage outside of the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state. In the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, the special normal attack grants Rage when it hits.

1021201.name: Daybreak Quartet
1021201.simpleDesc: Deals successive amounts of Physical DMG. Every strike landed on a locked-on enemy inflicts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> on the enemy. Hits on enemies defeated with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> grant <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> points. This skill resets to its first strike upon exiting the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state.

1021202.name: Dawn Finale
1021202.simpleDesc: Deals Physical DMG. Hits on enemies with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> clear it, granting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102101)>Luminous Echo</material> points.

1021203.name: Sunrise Symphony
1021203.simpleDesc:
Deals Physical DMG. Grants a progressively larger increase to Non-DoT Base DMG the further the Mod is from the locked-on enemy. For an amount of time after Daybreak Quartet hits, this skill changes to Sunrise Rhapsody.
Sunrise Rhapsody: Deals Physical DMG. The final strike dealt to enemies with <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Harmonizing Chord</material> clears it, granting <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102103)>Luminous Echo</material> points.

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color>When Sunrise Symphony hits, grants a certain amount of Rage depending on how far the Mod is from the locked-on enemy.

1021209.name: Dawnlight Cadence
1021209.simpleDesc: Enters the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, increasing the Non-DoT Crit Rate of teammates' normal attacks for the duration.

1021305.name: Haunting Note
1021305.simpleDesc:
Outside the <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102102)>Dawnlight</material> state, following up an Extremity Dodge with a normal attack within a specific amount of time will change the attack mode of the first strike of the normal attack. Following up with another normal attack will begin from its second strike.
Dodge Effect: Zero Time.

1020101.name: Age of Creation and Age of Destruction
1020101.simpleDesc:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state:
Deals Wind DMG and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Nirvana</material> each time an attack hits.

<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Age of Destruction</material> state:
Deals Wind DMG and grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material> each time an attack hits.

Passive:
 In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Catacylsmic Destruction</material> state, grants Super Armor, dealing Wind DMG to all enemies every second.
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Cataclysmic Destruction</material> state, Mahêśvara - Reveal, Mahêśvara - Annihilation, Suddhavasa - Reveal, Suddhavasa - Annihilation, and the Just Me Ultimate Skills will instantly defeat an enemy struck if its HP is under a certain amount.

<color=#297DE0>Aether Code:</color> Grants Divine Grace after a normal attack hits.

1020201.name: Mahêśvara
1020201.simpleDesc:
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state:
 Mahêśvara - Genesis: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material> is full, the total amount will be expended to unleash this skill, dealing Wind DMG. A short time after unleashing this skill, it will be replaced with Mahêśvara - Reveal, which can only be used after Mahêśvara - Genesis.
Mahêśvara - Reveal: Deals Wind DMG.

<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Catacylsmic Destruction</material> state:
Mahêśvara - Disintegration: When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material> is full, the total amount will be expended to unleash this skill, dealing Wind DMG. A short time after unleashing this skill, it will be replaced with Mahêśvara - Annihilation, which can only be used after Mahêśvara - Disintegration.
Mahêśvara - Annihilation: Deals Wind DMG.

<color=#297DE0>Aether Code: </color>Grants Divine Grace after a skill hits.

1020202.name: Mahākāla
1020202.simpleDesc:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Cataclysmic Destruction</material> state:
After unleashing this skill, deals Wind DMG and recovers Ultimate Skill charge each time a normal attack hits. This skill grants <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material> each time it hits.

<color=#297DE0>Divine Grace:</color> Grants Divine Grace each time the skill hits.

1020203.name: Suddhavasa
1020203.simpleDesc:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state: 
Suddhavasa - Genesis: Can be unleashed when Divine Grace is full, expending the total amount to deal Wind DMG. A short time after unleashing this skill, it will be replaced with Suddhavasa - Reveal, which can only be used after Suddhavasa - Genesis.
Suddhavasa - Reveal: Deals Wind DMG.

<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Cataclysmic Destruction</material> state:
Suddhavasa - Disintegration: Can be unleashed when Divine Grace is full, expending the total amount to deal Wind DMG. A short time after unleashing this skill, it will be replaced with Suddhavasa - Annihilation, which can only be used after Suddhavasa - Disintegration.
Suddhavasa - Annihilation: Deals Wind DMG.

1020209.name: Just Me
1020209.simpleDesc:
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state:
Deals Wind DMG and switches the Modifier to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Catacylsmic Destruction</material> state.
When switching to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Catacylsmic Destruction</material> state, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material> and Ultimate Skill CD both reset and the Ultimate Skillchain is cancelled.

<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102002)>Cataclysmic Destruction</material> state:
Deals Wind DMG and switches the Mod to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state.
When switching to <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state, <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material>, Dodge effect CD, the Ultimate Skill Charge of the Mod and other Mods with whom the Mod has a preset Ultimate Skillchain. The Ultimate Skill CD are all reset, and the Ultimate Skillchain is restored.

After an Asterism Mod attack hits, grants different Ultimate Skill charges depending on the number of current Asterism Mods on the team.

1020305.name: Concealed Lotus
1020305.simpleDesc:
Extremity Dodge will not trigger the Dodge effect.
In <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102001)>Age of Creation</material> state when the Dodge effect is not in CD, hold down Dodge to unleash a skill and trigger a Dodge effect. Increases ATK of all teammates. All teammates recover Ultimate Skill charge, and the Mod earns Divine Grace. After unleashing this skill, follow up with a normal attack to start from the third normal attack strike. Gain additional <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(102003)>Brahman</material> each time the third, fourth, and fifth normal attack strikes hit.
Dodge Effect: Enters Zero Time.

1156101.name: Nine Tribulations
1156101.simpleDesc:
Deals Thunder DMG.
Upon the fourth normal attack strike, tap on the normal attack button at the right time to trigger <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material> and causes the final normal attack strike to become boosted deal more Thunder DMG.

Passive:
Grants Super Armor during boosted normal attacks and skills. When <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material> is triggered, the remaining skill CD is shortened. 

<color=#297DE0>Rage: </color>Grants Rage after a normal attack hits.

1156201.name: First Tribulation - Gleam
1156201.simpleDesc:
Expends all Rage to deal Thunder DMG in two phases. When unleashing the first phase, tap on the normal attack button at the right time to trigger <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material>, causing the latter phase to become boosted and deal more Thunder DMG, and increases the Non-DoT Base DMG based on the amount of expended Rage.
Triggering the latter phase of <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material> inflicts hit enemies with Armor Break.

1156202.name: Third Tribulation - Vanquish
1156202.simpleDesc:
Teleports to the enemy's location and deals Thunder DMG with the initial strike. For a short duration after landing the hit, the skill can be activated again to unleash a follow-up attack that also deals Thunder DMG. After the first phase hits, tap on the normal attack button at the right time to trigger<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material> and causes the latter phase to be boosted, dealing more Thunder DMG. When the final attack hits, all your Skill DMG becomes increased. 

<color=#297DE0>Rage:</color> Grants Rage after the boosted latter phase of the attack hits.

1156203.name: Ninth Tribulation - Thunderclap
1156203.simpleDesc:
Expends all Rage to deal Thunder DMG. Hold down on the skill to charge it, and while charging, grants Super Armor and gathers enemies. Deals Thunder DMG depending on the charged strike count and increases Non-DoT Base DMG based on the amount of expended Rage.
when fully charged, triggers <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material>.

1156209.name: Twilight of Tribulation
1156209.simpleDesc:
Deals Thunder DMG and reduces enemy Thunder RES on hit.
Gain increased Crit DMG when the Modifier or a teammate unleashes an Ultimate Skill.

When the Modifier or a teammate triggers Extremity Dodge, instantly gain an Ultimate Skill charge.

1156305.name: Stormy Veil
1156305.simpleDesc:
Dodging will not interrupt the normal attack strike count. Triggering Extremity Dodge grants a <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115602)>Thunderstrike</material> Mark and subsequently casts <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115601)>Thunderous Splendor</material>. Tap on the normal attack button at the right time to boost the latter phase of the attack.
<material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115602)>Thunderstrike</material>: Expends all Marks when unleashing Ninth Tribulation - Thunderclap and reduces charge time. A <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115602)>Thunderstrike</material> Mark is lost every time the Mod is hit and loses HP. <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115602)>Thunderstrike</material> Marks will not be lost when unleashing boosted normal attacks and skills.
Dodge Effect: Restores Rage and <material=underline c=#FFFFFF h=2 event=terminology args=(115602)>Thunderstrike</material> Marks and resets the CD of Ninth Tribulation - Thunderclap.

6087101.name: Shooting
6087101.simpleDesc: Stands firm and launches a large, slow-speed water grenade that generates AoE damage upon hitting an enemy. Consumes water.

6087201.name: Skills
6087201.simpleDesc: Stands firm and fires a barrage of homing projectiles. Consumes water.

6087202.name: Counter
6087202.simpleDesc: Launches a water bullet upon a successful Counter, targeting the source of the attack. Explodes upon hit and generates small water bullets. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

6087209.name: Ultimate Skill
6087209.simpleDesc: Charges up and fires a large, slow-speed water grenade that explodes upon hit and generates multiple small water grenades.

6088101.name: Shooting
6088101.simpleDesc: Uses a submachine gun to fire a barrage of water projectiles. Consumes water.

6088201.name: Skills
6088201.simpleDesc: Summons a small recovery arcane circle a certain distance ahead that grants teammates within the circle a Recovery effect at regular intervals. Consumes water.

6088202.name: Counter
6088202.simpleDesc: A Counter automatically generates a bullet attack. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

6088209.name: Ultimate Skill
6088209.simpleDesc: Adds a Recovery effect to the entire team after use and increases ATK for a certain duration. Jinwu enters an Enhanced state, launching additional small water grenades when attacking.

6089101.name: Shooting
6089101.simpleDesc: Uses a shotgun to deal AoE damage to enemies a short distance away. Also briefly grants the Mod a Shield. Consumes water.

6089201.name: Skills
6089201.simpleDesc: Unleashes a whirlpool that continuously sucks in enemies. Consumes water.

6089202.name: Counter
6089202.simpleDesc: Triggers Counters more easily than for other Mods. Generates AoE damage around the Mod after a successful Counter, and the Mod gains a Shield. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

6089209.name: Ultimate Skill
6089209.simpleDesc: Creates an iceberg in front of the Mod that deals AoE damage. Increases the DEF of the entire team for a limited time after use, during which water recovery is doubled for anyone on the team that pulls off a successful Counter or Dodge. Gives a Shield to all the allies.

6090101.name: Shooting
6090101.simpleDesc: Stands firm and fires penetrating rays from a mounted gun. Consumes water.

6090201.name: Skills
6090201.simpleDesc: A puppet appears near Hades and deals AoE damage while Hades fires her mounted gun 1 time. Consumes water.

6090202.name: Counter
6090202.simpleDesc: Launches penetrating rays upon a successful Counter, targeting the source of the attack and dealing a great amount of damage. Recovers a large amount of water and Ultimate Skill Energy upon a successful Counter. Consumes water.

6090209.name: Ultimate Skill
6090209.simpleDesc: Leaps up and snipes, dealing additional AoE damage.
